title: Lily's Night Off
description:
The long-awaited sequel to Lily's Day Off: Lily's Night Off is a visual novel, but not in the typical sense: As you progress in this game, your actions drastically change character personalities, story lines, and lead to unexpected outcomes. 

---

Tsundere pop idol singer Lilypad Lily is back with the other two members of her idol group: Nym, the shy costume designer and Vicky, the energetic dance choreographer!

You wake up on the side of the road with no memories, no idea where you are, and the famous pop idol, Lilypad Lily, right in front of your eyes!

With each decision you make, personalities, histories, and outcomes take dramatic and wild turns.

Try to uncover the true ending to figure out why!

(This game can be played as a standalone without having played Lily's Day Off).

---

Lily's Night Off is a visual novel which puts the player in the position of the main character. You will play through the game and make choices as you interact with Lily, Nym, and Vicky: the famous pop idol sensations, The Lilypads.

However, this is not your typical visual novel where each route gives you new information on solid character personalities. Each choice reveals that locations, stories, and even characters are not what they may seem.

There are over 15 endings in total.

This is a comedy visual novel. There are no explicit scenes. There are some violent and scary scenes, however.

---

The game will feature over 10 unique songs, Artwork from over 12 different artists, more than 15 crazy endings, and lots of ridiculous situations!

You can download the soundtrack here: https://vectress.bandcamp.com/album/lilys-night-off-soundtrack
descriptionHTML:
The long-awaited sequel to Lily's Day Off: Lily's Night Off is a visual novel, but not in the typical sense: As you progress in this game, your actions drastically change character personalities, story lines, and lead to unexpected outcomes.

---

Tsundere pop idol singer Lilypad Lily is back with the other two members of her idol group: Nym, the shy costume designer and Vicky, the energetic dance choreographer!

You wake up on the side of the road with no memories, no idea where you are, and the famous pop idol, Lilypad Lily, right in front of your eyes!

With each decision you make, personalities, histories, and outcomes take dramatic and wild turns.

Try to uncover the true ending to figure out why!

(This game can be played as a standalone without having played Lily's Day Off).

---

Lily's Night Off is a visual novel which puts the player in the position of the main character. You will play through the game and make choices as you interact with Lily, Nym, and Vicky: the famous pop idol sensations, The Lilypads.

However, this is not your typical visual novel where each route gives you new information on solid character personalities. Each choice reveals that locations, stories, and even characters are not what they may seem.

There are over 15 endings in total.

This is a comedy visual novel. There are no explicit scenes. There are some violent and scary scenes, however.

---

The game will feature over 10 unique songs, Artwork from over 12 different artists, more than 15 crazy endings, and lots of ridiculous situations!

You can download the soundtrack here: https://vectress.bandcamp.com/album/lilys-night-off-soundtrack
summary: You just ran into the Lilypads! Will you help them or hurt them?

title: Aiko Stickman Adventure
description:
On the horizon on a majestic, vast and undiscovered desert. Join Aiko Stickman Adventure and friends to embark on an endless sand slide journey to discover the mystery.
Surf up the windswept sand dunes, cross the bumpy canyons, and explore hidden cities hidden in distant lands.
Along the way, you will cross the vineyards, jump on the top of the balloon, slide on the towering rock walls, and escape from the mischievous lemur while exploring the desert. exploring with a myriad of mysteries.
FEATURES:
• Discover mysteries in the sky with balloons, movable walls and sliding walls.
• In addition to mobile lighting and weather effects such as sandstorms and meteors, the desert is home to tornadoes and flash floods.
• Unlocking six characters, each character possesses different qualities and abilities.
• Complete the play mode with soothing music, this relaxed mode: no score, no coin, no power increase. Only you and the endless desert.
• Image mode. Zoom, rotate, rotate, and zoom in on the ideal frames
• Original music and sound from handmade instruments.
HOW TO PLAY:
Please drag the screen and let the deer fly around.
While touching the screen, the deer moves forward.
Only two things to be careful
· Please do not turn off the light
· Be careful not to bump into buildings
Now, let's play and experiences!

title: Shadow Super Saiyan Dragon
description:
Are u a crazy fan of Goko? Do you love super dragon fight and Super Saiyan?

As son goko Transform to super saiyan, You'll play as songoku dragon z in saiyans battle

Enjoy dragon z fighters in this release with goko, vegeta, Piccolo, son gohan, bulma, Trunks, warrior, Porunga, And krillin and much more.

In another universe, there is a Super Saiyen superhero (known as super dragon) who has become Legendary, his from another planet like Earth! We're talking about making up the story of the legendary fight with Lord Frieze, Mutant Cell,Terminator Majin, Cursed Kid, CrazyMan Broly, against Fusion War to protect our planet save our life!

Brand new epic battle of songoku. Spend a lot of evil skeleton, warriors, Frieza, majin buu, bardock, android 17&18, Beerus, Mr Popo & Satan, broly, Dende, yamcha, Videl, Vados, Shenlong, so be careful!

This is a new fighting games, primarily inspired from dragon fighter fan. By tapping the screen with fingers, you will move with superhero son goko on many obstacles, fight and shoot the bats, Nappa, gotenks, raditz, Champa, many other monsters dragon. the player can also cause an intense battle to unfold and enjoy the fighting action on their smartphone. Featuring the smartphone's sense of control to its greatest extent, super high-speed fights are possible. The player will have chance to use the cool skills effect like Ki Blast, Gigantic Gun, Death Ball, Dragon Finger Ball and so much action skills.

★ STORY ★ 

Goko and his friends must fight a new battle against enemies from parallel xenoverse, who want to usurped special ball. The story is split into several chapters: the evil king piccolo, the saiyan clan invasion, the emperor of darkness frieza, the android army, the cell games, the revived of buu, the battle of goko.

★ How to play ★

- Tap any where in the empty space to move your hero

- Switch skills during the fight by tapping on their icons at the bottom-right corner

- At a long distance, tap on the enemy to fire quick shots, or hold for a few seconds to charge up and release a massive energy burst

- At a closer range, tap on your enemy to approach and dish out a series of melee attacks

- Swipe the screen toward your enemy to perform a deadly dash attack

★ Skills ★

• KI Blast: Basic techniques when you’re lacking energy.

• Great "Kai" Energy ball from sky.

• Kameha: attack with energy wave. It’s Goko's signature technique.

• Spirit Bomb: collect energy in the form of a sphere. A very powerful attack.

• Little with kung fu "Kai" Energyball.

• Dragon Strike: attack with very high speed.

• Super Saiyan: transform to unleash the ultimate power. you can transform to max form SSJ3.

• amazing Kame - blow enemy with "KAI" energy.

• Hidden Skill: you can use hidden skill when beat enemies.

★ Features ★

• 50+ dragon z fighters famous such as goko, vegeta, gohann.

• 75+ unique and signature skill such as soaring dragon strike, spirit ball.

• incredible graphics, smooth gameplay, impression effects, HD sounds.

• multiple transformations SSJ to SSGSS.

• 50+ bosses with 20+ levels.

• Easy to control an play.

• Generous daily awards.

• Many equipment to collect and upgrade.

Become super heroes and fighters of history with full skill of a super hero!

title: Path of Sin: Greed
description:
FANTASTIC HIDDEN OBJECT PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME FROM THE CREATORS OF ENIGMATIS AND GRIM LEGENDS!

It was supposed to be a simple suicide case – a quick inspection and lots of boring paperwork. But the more you delve into this secluded island and the twisted family relations of the owners, the more complicated and unclear this case becomes.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

A rookie inspector on her first assignment and her experienced copartner arrive at the scene – a luxurious island in the middle of the ocean owned by a young millionaire, who wants the matter concluded as quietly as possible. The question in this case appears simple enough:  was a security guard's death a suicidal plunge, or maybe an unfortunate fall? 
The residents of the island - the Bradford family - at first seem cordial and beyond reproach, even shocked by the death of a friendly employee. But upon closer inspection it becomes clear that they harbor animosities and deep hidden motives. The more you delve into this secluded island and the twisted family relations on it, the more complicated and unclear the matter becomes. A seemingly routine case turns into a tale of machinations driven by greed and a suicide investigation reveals multiple murders.
Is anyone innocent? Will you be able to predict the assassin's next step?

• Enjoy over 39 mysterious locations!
• Challenge yourself with 36 riddles and Hidden Object puzzles!
• Find out more about the enigmatic family members!
• Get 16 challenging achievements!
• Find 28 collectibles!

title: Star vs Evil : Adventure of Butterfly Princes
description:
Star vs the forces of evil is a cool Jump and Run  addictive non-stop old school arcade jungle adventure game!

the lovely butterfly star is being kidnapped by the evil forces,  and brought to star butterfly's mysterious castle. It is up to Star butterfly our brave character  to rescue her from the forces of evil!
But take care! Lots of enemies, troubles, obstacles, traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle and mysterious castle.
To get to the butterfly , princess star butterfly will have to run and jump over obstacles, fight and shoot against all the forces of evil : angry bees, crocs, crawfishes, snakes, birds, frogs, hedgehogs, mushrooms, skeletons, leps, snails and many other dragons and monsters.
Climb up huge mountains and stairs, fight against perhistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden blocks and levels, collect coins and diamonds, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel enemies and bosses.


Features of Star butterfly Adventure game:
+ 4 different addictive worlds (Mysteious castle, Malacious land, Dream land and creepy castle)
+ 30 beautiful, well-designed and challening levels with increasing difficulty
+ 8 awesome boss fights the forces of evil (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different castles
+ many power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items
+ over 4 different, great animated foces of evil enemies such as crocs, frogs, spiders, snails and many more
+ high resolution graphics - great mix between 2D and 3D graphics
+ retro arcade music and old school sound effects
+ perfect, intuitve game control through retro control pad like on console games
+ special Star butterfly skills hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks
+ awesome gameplay reminding to retro classic games
+ sea and water worlds - jumping, running and swimming !
+ try to unlock all achievements and to be number one of leaderboards!

How to play star butterfly adventure mysterious castle:
+ for moving star super butterfly character click on right or left on the control pad!
+ click down for ducking or on some tree stumps to get to a bonus level!
+ press B-button to make star butterfly jumping!
+ press A-button AND right or left for running; press A and B together for a higher and wider jump!
+ after eating an apple you become Super Silver star butterfly and will be able to destroy bricks!
+ after eating a golden flower you become Super Golden star super butterfly and will be able to shoot balls - press B-Button for shooting!
+ star vs the forces of evil swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release your finger from button to go down!

Enjoy this game new mysterious jungle adventure platformer game!

title: Syobon Adventure 3 - Super Cat Action
description:
It is pretty cute. However, the game is not as cute as its character itself. It may be quite hard for somebody. Mission is not to rescue the princess, you only have to overcome 6 stages of Super Cat instead. The 6 stages of Cat World can make you go crazy because of the difficulties and the challenges that you have to pass.
Cat World 4 features a protagonist with a facial likeness to a cat except he or she walks upright like a human. This game is based on the world famous Super bros game. You are a white cat and you try to go as far as you can but there are enemies trying to stop you. There are a total of four levels and each contains various traps such as falling brick walls, bouncing monsters, death spikes, power blocks with poison mushrooms or hidden blocks that when hit will trap the player's progression in the level.
You will need to have really big patience if you want to win this game. You don't need to collect any coins because you will never get an extra life. Just keep calm and see all of the possible dangers that are coming and later evade them when you start playing from beginning or from the blue flag. Blue check point flags, if touched, will save the level restart point as that part if Syobon happens to die.
Syobon Adventure main method of attacking is a scratching attack that works in close corners. This can be dangerous against enemies that can strike from a distance. Though Syobon 4 can climb up walls, this leaves him wide open to other enemy attacks as he cannot fight while stuck to the wall. It has been dubbed a "rage" game due to the very easy accumulation in number of deaths the player can obtain from the constant and unfair traps that kill the protagonist, and the frustration behind how difficult it is to pass an area without repeatedly dying. Despite the surprise factor of these traps, the levels do not change between plays, allowing the player to memorize their locations and eventually make progress. Experienced players must still remain on guard, though, lest they let years of platforming convention overrule their knowledge of the traps and trick them into deadly accidents.
 Walkthrough of Super Cat
If you are familiar with the classic bros game, it is quite easy for you to play cat world game, because Cat World game has the same way to play like bros. Therefore, you may feel so familiar when you play the action game.

✔Use the up button to jump up
✔Use the left arrow button to move to the left
✔Use the down arrow button to go down or down the sewer pipes.
✔Use the right arrow button to go straight or move to the right.
Challenges in Syobon Adventure
Syobon Adventure game does not have so many stages, but in each stage, it is very difficult for players to complete all the missions. Moreover, players have to spend so much time and effort to overcome all the challenges. If you think it is too easy to play Cat Troll game, you are totally wrong. In the first time, I did think so, but I change my mind right after starting the game.
 The first stage has the scene on the ground and the sun is shining. Your mission in this stage is to reach the flag pole, go downward and come into the house to start the next stage. When you complete a mission, the next stage will be unblocked. On the way to the flag pole, there are so many crawling monster, you can jump and kill them or just pass them and go on your way. At the same time, do not forget to collect gold coins around you or hidden in the “?” boxes, but remember that not all of them are safe for you. In the “?” boxes, there may be monsters, unlucky stars, which you should stay away.
When passing the sewer pipes, you should be careful, because sometimes, there are monsters suddenly flying out or falling down. So, you have to be careful, wait until the right time to jump and pass by. Clouds, flying walls or walls on the ground seem to be harmless but so dangerous.

It includes a great variety of modern houses and many different kinds of structures. In one end of the city there is even a farm with a barn and horses and so on.

title: Wild Block West - Cowboys and Horses Craft
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of Dangerous Wild Block West - Cowboys and Horses Craft.

Wild Block West - Cowboys and Horses Craft - the game of craft in the world of the great Wild West! You will have to build your own city. Build residential houses, a hospital, shops and a railway to another city. And you also have to look for gold, and get food and water. You will create weapons and fight against Indians and bandits who will attack your city. Make your city the most modern in all Wild West.

- Exciting and easy game
- The real world of the Wild West
- Build shops, houses, hospitals
- Protect one's population
- Unique building blocks

title: Lollipop Candy Blast
description:
Match 3 candies to add jelly drops to get along the candy path. With a sweet surprise on every corner, a new mystery that unfolds in every area of the Kingdom of Jelly. Whether you enjoy the excitement of brain teasers or find a fun way to relax, Jellipop Match provides the best high-quality experience.

Help Lolli and Candy on their way to save the Lollipop Candy Blast Kingdom! Playing as Lolli, you will fight magicians, monsters, periarchies, and more on your journey throughout many kingdoms. Master your movements and match more than three sweets to be seen with various clearing board boosters! Use jelly spoons, cross bombs, sweet juices, and other magic boosters to improve your game. Jellipop offers a variety of new features, game modes and battles.

Lollipop Candy Blast is completely free to play!

title: Old Man's Journey Demo
description:
Please make sure you are logged in to your Google Play Games account to transfer your progress into the full game.

Explore life’s complexities through the old man’s eyes as you experience his heartache, regret, and hope.

"A gorgeous experience" - TouchArcade (10/10)
"Got me to cry" - Kotaku
"A whimsical poem" - Polygon - (8/10)

Immerse yourself in a visual narrative as you uncover stories of the old man’s life told through beautiful vignettes of his memories. Interact with the serene, whimsical environment as you solve playful puzzles and shape the landscape around you, growing the hills to create the old man’s path forward.

- Designed for touch
- A powerful and emotional narrative told only through imagery
- Gorgeously whimsical landscapes with hand-drawn art and animations
- Handcrafted, pressure-free puzzles
- Unique landscape-shaping mechanic
- A compact game experience perfect for a wanderlust-evoking escape 
- Original and emotionally compelling soundtrack by SCNTFC
- Crisp drawings designed to look beautiful on your phone and tablet

DUE TO HIGH QUALITY TEXTURES WE RECOMMEND PLAYING ON DEVICES WITH AT LEAST 1024 MB RAM AS WEAKER DEVICES MAY EXPERIENCE PROBLEMS.

title: 脱出ゲーム ニーナとゆめの島
description:
脱出ゲーム 『ニーナとゆめの島』


ゆめの島という伝説の島

なんでもワクワクどきどきの
楽しいところなんだとか…

そのゆめの島をめざして…





▼特徴▼
●本作はステージ型で、各ステージに用意された謎を解いていきます。
●ステージごとに分かれたヒントや答えもあるので、
初心者の方も最後までお楽しみいただけます。
●全ステージ無料で遊べます。



▼遊び方▼
●タップで調べます。
●アイテム欄をタップし、アイテムを選択します。
●アイテムは選択中にもう一度タップすると拡大できます。
●画面上にあるメニューボタンを選択してメニューを呼び出します。
●画面上にある？ボタンからヒント、答えをみることができます。



★攻略のポイント★
●画面の至る所をくまなくタップしてみましょう。
●アイテムもくまなく観察しましょう。
●アイテムは組み合わせることもあります。
●ゲーム内で得られる全ての情報を逃さないようにしましょう。



★おすすめポイント★
●綺麗な景色、動物が好きな方、脱出ゲームが好きな方におすすめ。
●２段階のヒントや答えもあるので、初心者の方にもおすすめです。



★あそびごころ。の特徴★
１ステージのボリュームにこだわり、ちょっと《遊び心》を取り入れました。

title: Escape Game Trip
description:
Welcome to "Escape Game Trip"!

Squirrel will go to see her grandma by herself.
Please help her to arrive safely.
You can play with easy operation only with taps.

■ How to play
Tap to find out.
If you want to use items, select the item and tap the place you want to use.
To enlarge an item, tap the item twice.
If you want to combine items, enlarge the item, select the item you want to combine, and tap.
To close an enlarged item, tap the cross button.
If you need hints, tap the bulb button.

■ Function
There is an auto save function.

■ Features
Beginners can enjoy it to the last.
Recommended for those who like cute world view.

title: Fate of Nimi: Adventure Platform Game
description:
What if you get lost in a mystical world and the only way to return back is the fight.

Fate of Nimi is a story of a teenage girl named Nimi. In the middle of a journey, Nimi lost herself in a dark mystical world where monsters rule over human lives.

Can Nimi help them? Can Nimi find a way back home?

Let's go together on an epic journey with Nimi and discover what our Fate brings us.  


GAME FEATURES:

-SMOOTH AND EASY CONTROLS (jump and shoot)
Simple Jump and shoot Fun gameplay with smooth controls. Platform jump, Run, climb walls, jump on trees and many more movements in a fast-paced environment. 

-EPIC BOSS FIGHTS (deadly bosses)
Fight against massive monsters and beat the boss to collect keys.

-UNIQUE CHALLENGING LEVELS (tricky platform game)
Freshly designed unique challenging levels to keep you on toes. The game has many tricky areas too.

-LOTS OF ENEMIES (one of the challenging game)
This platform game has lots of enemies like flying creatures, monsters, insects etc.

-RESCUE HOSTAGES (save hostages from monsters)
Rescue hostages from imprisonment to collect stars.

-MANY SPECIAL POWERS (unlock magical powers)
Collect different magical powers in almost every level. You can also upgrade powers by spending coins.
    
-STUNNING PIXEL ART GRAPHICS (modern pixel art graphics)
Witness the most beautiful pixel art graphics, hand-crafted with lots of love.

-COLLECT COINS AND FRUITS (a fun platform game)
Collect coins and use them to unlock special powers. Discover hidden places to collect more coins.

-INTERESTING STORYLINE (a gripping story)
A fun platformer with the interesting storyline. A story which takes you in a mystical world, 
where the fight is an only option to survive.

Let's PLAY the most addictive 2d adventure platform game ever. 


Permissions used in the game:

-Internet
Check your network, WIFI and internet availability. Fate of Nimi requires Internet to serve ads and player revive options.

-Write External Storage
Fate of Nimi needs access to the file system to run properly.

Fun!!!
This game about favourite le go assasin ninja in the world, hero against galaxy star enemies , steal your powers to be able to transform into aliens.
Your job is to break this curse and bring back good to the le ninja go world. 
Stop an evil curse from overtaking the world. Charge your omni to be able to become a powerful alien!
Blast all enemies during a holiday journey on a distant planet!

Jump, Run and Gun enemies to dodge attacks, and move back and forth to escape from falling objects.

title: New Escape Games - Lovable Forest
description: The office could make you feel suffocated if you stayed there for more than five days. You had extra work on the weekend as your office mate had some trouble at home. You were not so sure if he was telling the truth or he just wanted to escape the task. But you had not much option. Plus you'd earn more if you performed the task. Yet it seemed like the office was just too much. So you looked for a place where you could rest your eyes for a while. The place you found was a peafowl forest. It had such a refreshing view that you wished to stay there longer and enjoy the boundless beauty of nature. You had a few winks due to the relaxing feel of the place when you suddenly remembered you needed to get back to work. You scrambled to your feet and looked around. It took quite a while for you to remember where you were and why you were there. But even after remembering it, you still had no idea how to leave the forest. You knew you should be out of here before your boss runs out of his patience as well. Good luck and have fun!

title: Ludo Maze Runner
description:
Ludo Maze Runner is a 3D Game which is like Snakes Ladders game - The fantasy of every child comes alive with this amazing Snakes Ladders 3D board game!

You can re-live the thrilling experience of Snakes & Ladders game set in a beautifully rendered 3D environment with breath-taking animations.

Feeling lucky? On the staircase, your dice might take you to the top with a ladder or push you down on the back of a snake.

All players start at stair 1 and the one who reaches stair 100 first wins. If a dice roll takes you to the bottom of a ladder, you will move up to the ladder's top. If, however, you reach the higher end of a enemy, you will slide to the lower end of the game.

Main Features:

✔ Stunning 3D Graphics. At the start you see a Board-view with all the 100 steps, with the different enemies and Ladders along the way. On the roll of the dice, you see a beautiful castle and players - all in 3D. Breath-taking animations for the actions of enemies and Ladders…
✔ 3 Different 3D levels with stunning details.
✔ Classic Gameplay. Upto 2 players can play, taking turns to roll the dice and move up (or down) the mysterious castle. All set in the classic style of this ancient game…

✔ Single or Multiplayer Mode. Play single, play or play with friends. See who races to the top of the castle, braving all the Snakes and enjoying the Ladders…

✔ Variety of Characters. Choose from upto 4 awesome 3D avatars with unique characteristics…. from the petite girl Sky to the cool guy Razor. With 3 different game board designs and 3 dice, you’ll never run out of idea…

✔ Haunting Audio. enemy and teleport comes with thrilling sound effects that double the joy of playing! The roll of the dice, the hiss of the snake, the climb up the stairs...you’ll enjoy every bit!!

✔ 21 Real Powers. You can win from 21, almost unfair Powers! Makes the game super-exciting and thrilling!

Ludo Maze Runner is free to play, with great in-app purchases. You’re just one tap away from reliving your childhood memories!.

title: The Nameless Grave
description:
As a private detective in the backwater town of Logslow, you are no stranger to unexplained occurrences. However, when you wake up to discover that your wife has vanished off the face of the earth, you must embark on your most personal investigation to date.

You quickly discover that your wife’s mysterious disappearance may go much deeper than a simple abduction. Against a black winter night, you venture across Logslow’s bleak and desolate landscape in search of answers.

Through defiled cemeteries and abandoned buildings, downtrodden streets and prison cells, you uncover sights horrific enough to disturb even the most hardened detective. Bodies fall into your lap, all of which hint at a reality too harrowing to comprehend.

As you find yourself drawn into a world of occult rites and esoteric underground cults, bizarre visions and hallucinations blur the line between reality and illusion. You must question everything and everyone on your journey towards the truth.

title: Nelson in Aventura
description:
-- RO --

Porneste in aventura cu Nelson Mondialu, carismaticul personaj care a cucerit Romania prin videoclipurile sale virale de pe youtube.

Ajuta-l sa treaca de obstacolele din viata de zi cu zi, sa reziste tentatiei pacanelelor, fereste-l de dentistul cel rau si tine-l cat mai departe de sotia lui care abia asteapta sa il certe din nou.

Joaca-te si descopera surpriza! La un moment dat vei reusi sa te transformi in veverita si sa aduni cat mai multe ghinde pentru a beneficia de mai multe caractere.

BONUS: Pe langa jocul animat cu Nelson, ai si o pagina cu sunete (soundboard) unde poti reda cele mai cunoscute si amuzante replici ale personajului.

Provoaca-ti prietenii si urca pe locul 1 in clasamentul live. Arata-le ca esti fanul suprem al lui Nelson!

Joc Romanesc facut de Wyverin Entertainment.

-- EN --

Start the adventure with Nelson Mondialu, the charismatic character who conquered Romania through his viral videos from youtube.

Help him get past the obstacles in his everyday life, resist the temptation of the pawns, guard him from the evil dentist and keep him as far from his wife as you can because she is just waiting to argue again.

Play and discover the surprise! At some point you will be able to turn into squirrel and collect as many acorns as possible to get more characters.

BONUS: Besides the animated game with Nelson, you also have a soundboard where you can hear the most famous and funny lines of the character.

Challenge your friends and climb first in the live standings. Show them you're Nelson's supreme fan!

Romanian game made by Wyverin Entertainment.

title: Bionic Heart Free To Play
description:
London, 2099. The earth isn't what it used to be anymore. Incredible climate changes have corrupted the weather, causing a permanent rain on most of the Earth's surface. 

You play the role of Luke Black, a 36-year-old bio-informatic engineer. He is one of the lead programmers at Nanotech, a big nanotechnology research company. 

But one night, his life is changed forever when he encounters Tanya. Who is she? What does she wants from Luke? 

Purchase the full version to see all 24 different endings and explore all the possible paths! It's a truly dynamic adventure that will keep you entertained for hours. 

The game features beautiful manga art, brilliant dialogue and characters relationship that will change the final outcome of the game.

title: Furniture Mod for MCPE
description:
The application will help install automatically big pack furniture in your mcpe world.
Our application will help you install a wonderful mod that is very useful for any player in Minecraft Pocket Edition.
Mod adds a huge pack of junk furniture that will help decorate your home and decorate the interior. 
With some objects you can interact. For example, the radio can be used for playing songs and the fridge can 
be used for storing food items. But the main and most important part is the fact that they look really good and 
can also be used just as decorations for your builds.
You can now trade Furniture Items by finding or spawning a Villager and interact it with a Bit-Emerald to spawn a Furniture Seller.

title: Harpy horror game
description:
It happened yesterday. It was an ordinary rainy evening. The day was not successful, I got a bad evaluation at the university, caught a cold, quarreled with a girlfriend and fought with a friend.
I drank Dr. Mom from my throat, brushed my teeth, made a plan for tomorrow, and was about to go to bed. And then I got on the phone a strange message from the Japanese phone number from the user Harpy.
In the photo there was a girl (pretty ugly, but I thought it was a photo editor). She wrote me "hello."
Hmm, I thought, I want to flirt. Wrote hello in response.
Then events were like a horror movie.
At first the Harpy (homo sapiens bird) wrote to me that she knew who I was and where I lived.
Then she wrote that if I did not do what she said, she would hurt me. And she wrote - Dora is dead (I didn't understand that does it mean). 
I decided to not continue to communicate with her, wrote so far, and put on the blacklist.
What happened next, I was very frightened.
Harpy sent me my photos, which I had never seen before.
Then I heard a call, where I heard some steps in the background and eerie laughter.
I hung up. I cried mom...ou...mom...momo..oooo...are you? She did't answer me.
I tried to sleep. I could not sleep all night, but I was afraid to open my eyes. There was a feeling that fear held me together.
I opened my eyes and experienced a terrible shock.
I'm in an eerie labyrinth. Somewhere in the distance, I hear footsteps.
We need to get out of here urgently.
I do not know why, but Harpy hunts me.
I must be saved.

title: Maze Ball 360
description:
Do you love playing Mazeball games app? Then this is the right app for you: Mazeball360. This is a completely free games maze ball app for the users who wish to play arcade games.

Being a traditional game, this Maze Runner makes the mind sounds good and happy, and also it helps to improve the ability of our mind as well as children.

This mazeball puzzle game helps to improve the IQ and logical solving skills of the children. This 360 Maze game has 107 levels to complete. Try this maze kids game to find the right path before the time runs out.

In this kids maze puzzle game has a unique and classic concept.  So children, adult and everyone need to play this ball puzzle game.
 
Ball Maze game is an addictive game. The player take ball and drop in to the destination hole. Ball maze game is a really addictive game and also need lot of skills to complete levels. So Use your brain and prove your intelligence skill through this ball puzzle game. 

There are many categories in this maze kids game which makes you more enthusiastic and happy.

Features of this Maze Games app:

There are 5 categories in this Mazes & More Games for kids app. They are

Animals – There are 10 levels in this game. You need to find the right path to help the animals to reach its destination.

Birds – There are 10 levels in this game. You need to find the right path to help the birds to reach its destination.

Insects – There are 10 levels in this game. You need to find the right path to help the insects to reach its destination.

General – There are 50 levels in this game. You need to find the right path to reach the destination.

Story – There are 5 levels in this game. You need to find the right path to reach the destination.

This maze balance ball app or roll the ball game has sound on/off feature which helps you to mute the volume whenever you need it.

On/off button in the home page of this roll the ball game exits you out of the game.

Other features of this maze ball games:

In this ball maze runner free app, Demo is provided to help you play this game well.

You can download our ball rolling games / Rolling ball app at free of cost.

You can share this ball moving games app with your friends via social media.

You can play this ball puzzle games app in offline mode.

This 360 Maze or Maze 360 is a completely free app.

This ball maze games app has a user-friendly interface.

How to play?

You need to find the right path to reach the destination.

You need to move up and down, left and right by simply tilting your mobile phone.

While moving the ball, you should not touch the Spider. This will reduce the Life count of the Alien.

Also, while moving, the mazeball should not touch the game. This will end the game.

Maze Runner game challenges both your patience and your skills. This maze challenge game is a good brain exercise for the little ones. Once you play this maze challenge game you will be hooked forever.

title: CluedUpp Detective
description:
CluedUpp design murder-mystery events and games all over the World, allowing small teams to put their sleuthing skills to the test... 

Using our award-winning app, teams hunt all over their chosen city, finding virtual witnesses, eliminating suspects and bringing the killer to justice. Can you solve the clues in time?

This is just like real-life Cluedo, so get your magnifying glass ready and see your favourite city in a new and exciting way. 

To find your nearest game, please visit www.CluedUpp.com

title: Down and Under
description:
A squirrel is trapped on a cursed tower. If you want to survive, you can only jump down. If you jump up, you will be cursed and die.

The bottom of the tower is constantly stepped up, and the more the number of jumps, the longer it takes to survive. Picking up props on the steps can help the squirrels to prolong their survival time. Of course, the most important thing is to take your God's operation.

title: Butterfly Island - Hands Free Edition
description:
This, "Hands Free" Edition, requires no controller, and can be used with any simple Google Cardboard compatible viewer! Simply look in the direction you want to move, then look up to move forward and look down to move backwards.

Need a mini-vacation? Explore Butterfly Island and meet new friends, such as Freddy Flamingo, Chatty Caracal and Molly Monkey.  See if you can find a lemonade stand on the island and gather treasure for points. Or you can just sit on the beach and watch the waves lapping on the shore. Developed to provide relaxation and enjoyment for kids and families. Created by Northwestern Mutual Childhood Cancer Program. The butterflies created by the kids of Ronald McDonald House of Southeastern Wisconsin.

-You will walk slowly around the island. Line up butterflies with the dot, and try to catch them all!

Learn more about the Northwestern Mutual Foundation:
http://foundation.northwesternmutual.com

Learn more about the Southeastern Wisconsin Ronald McDonald House:
https://rmhc-easternwi.org

Thank you for playing! We appreciate your support of Childhood Cancer Research!!!

Please visit Alex's Lemonade Stand: https://www.alexslemonade.org

Thanks for playing!

title: BlocBoy - Look Alive - Piano Magical Game
description:
Do usual color annoy you? You want something more spectacular and amusing? Well we are here to help! We created this game to fulfill your wishes. Golden background, multiple songs and smooth gameplay will keep you entertained all the time.

title: Flying Iron Superhero 2018:Mission City Rescue

Superhero rescue game is an exclusive blend of US army superhero rescue games.
Your mission in Grand Iron Superhero spider and iron hero Flying City Rescue Mission is to rise and fly over the grand city, find and save lives of the injured people waiting for help. Flying Iron Superhero has special powers for destruction. The only Hero will be able to save the city from goons and another street mobster. description:
Avoid all floating objects, take coins while flowing downstream in the river.
Save the egg carried by boat.

Touch and drag the boat across the screen to avoid obstacles and take coins while passing through the forest in river.

Simple gameplay for causal game and entertainment.

title: Super Marioo bros World
description:
The game was the first smooth-scrolling platform game, as each screen need not be individually loaded; the entire level was one smooth experience.
 
Super Marioo bros World is a 64-level extravaganza that sends Marioo up against Bowser, king of the koopas. As Marioo, you'll stomp on the insidious turtle creatures, crush mushroom-like goombas beneath your feet, and absolutely crush bullet bills, buzzy beetles, and the like. You'll pick up fireflowers and gain the ability to shoot fireballs, which you'll use to burn up the Hammer brothers, spinys, piranha plants, and more. But mostly, you'll do a whole lot of running and jumping as you make your way through the game's eight worlds. The game's worlds are broken up into four levels each. The fourth level of each world is a castle level with a boss fight against the evil Bowser at the end. The boss fights are mostly identical, with you attempting to either blast your nemesis with fireballs or sneak past him to grab an axe, which causes the bridge Bowser's standing on to collapse. 

Players negotiate 8 challenging worlds, stomping on enemies as they pass through, and battling Bowser at the end of each. It was so frustrating on my first run through Super Marioo bros World when that silly little Princess never seemed to be able to stay put in one place. She was always one step ahead;

Reaching the end of each level is a pleasurable experience, as the controls are extremely tight and rarely let the player down. In the second stage it is imperative to be absolutely pixel-perfect in jumping from one narrow ledge to another - and with the proper skill, this is easily accomplished. While there may be several times where Marioo ends up in a bottomless pit, for the most part, the controls do as they're told and are dead-on

title: Pixels FPS Unkonwn Battle Mad Guns: shooting games
description:
Pixels FPS Unkonwn Battle Mad Guns: shooting games

Pixel Battle Real Royale Season 2018! If you like military blocky pixel games and battle royale games then you will definitely like Pixels FPS Unkonwn Battle Ground Game.

Get into the world of the pixel royale gangster crime city and experience the fascinating action packed grand crime unknown royale that will take you to another blocky world. Come into the world of the pixel gangster in which the mafia criminal are ready to do anything in the open world battleground. Engage yourself into the ruthless world of thug gang city of sin. Time to roll up the sleeves and come into the grand battle gangster crime city.

Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. Players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Find the best weapons you can: Assault Rifle, pixel gun, smg, shotguns and other weapons. Dominate the battlefield by taking on each opponent and become last survivor #1! Grab your pixel gun and get shooting!

A wealth of weapons, attachments and vehicles to be discovered. Beware, your safe zone is shrinking! Safe zone is blue. So collect scattered weapons, arm yourself to the teeth, and wield your tactics like no one else. Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

Shoot with AK, machine gun, smg and other weapons. Survive the battlegrounds, improve your shooting skills. Grab any gun and dive into battle. If you like battle royale games and blocky military pixel games then you will definitely like Pixels FPS Unkonwn Battle Grounds Game

Mobile Battle 3D is survival shooter game for mobiles and tablets.

title: Divine Academy
description:
Divine Academy is a unique mixture of strategy and god-simulation genres. Build your ancient city, develop your godly skills and rule your people.

Become a part of a fascinating world – a university for ancient Greek deities. Pass exams at the Divine Academy and get a license to cast the most powerful miracles! Build the most amazing metropolis by casting spells, accumulating wealth and empowering those around you. 

Be it gardening, architecture or math, help your people learn and explore new frontiers. 

Discover the vast and beautiful game world and learn to rule it!

FEATURES

  - Transform your village into a prosperous metropolis
  - Learn from deities and become one of them
  - Cast spells to fight your enemies 
  - Construct stunning buildings and explore fascinating ruins
  - Interact with charismatic and witty characters
  - Have fun finding hidden treasures 
  - Experience amazing atmosphere of ancient Greek island
  - Explore new lands and their secrets 
  - Invite your friends from Facebook  and cast miracles together

title: Helical Jump
description:
If you are looking for Arcade games for enjoyment purpose, then you can choose or use the Helical Jump Platform, which gives you an amazing and encourage to play continuously this game. We know that the game is the best source spending free time, boring time, friend-zone theme. With the help of this game, you can explore and set your concentration particular on goal.

It is a very simple, reasonable and reliable game which are freely available on the Google Play Store. You can simply play this game by installing in your smartphone and tablet. You can just touch your finger on the gadget screen and move according to ball balancing. You cannot move the ball on the screen you can just shake the screen and the pillar and manage the ball balancing in the center and break the pillar by ball falling on the pillar surface.

When you open the apps you are not required to register any information of the users. You can freely play the game without any registration or Login and Signup process. You can rotate the game maze and the jumping ball consider the gap of plates But always keep in mind that the colors of the ball cannot touch that colorful strip if this happens then you can get out of the game. If you die after few steps, then game automatic restart after a few seconds, which is the good thing about this game.

Rule of Helical Game
Be Concentrated on the ball.
Always keep in mind the color strip
Do not let the ball on the same color strip.
You can collect the diamond to boost your let down speed.

Features of the Game
You can play anywhere, anytime this game.
Simple and user-friendly game.
Impressive GUI.
Multiple levels of the ball game.
Impressive tower of plates.
Fast game experience.
Peaceful music and sound effects.
Impressive and best game of the generation.

title: Girls Shopping Mall Fun Day - Fashion Adventure
description:
Girls Shopping Mall Fun Day - Fashion Adventure is trending styles to dressUp and makeover girls game. Every girl wants to fulfil her desires in unique fashion attire and wants to available top quality makeups, dresses, jewellery, cosmetics, shoes , bags and other shopping stuff in cheap & discounted prices. This city store shopping mall has discounts and sales on new arrivals. There are flash sales discounts on famous fashion designers for both poor and rich girls. Some fashion models have also arrived to enjoy these flash sales discounts in public shopping malls to promote fashion designers boutiques & taking selfies with photoshoot for designers promotional albums & magazines. Fill your wardrobes with dresses in budget discount sales prices. Shopping is lot of fun with friends. Look around at jewellery, bags, girls evening wear, sports wear, knitwear, scarf, coats, flat shoes, skirts, sandals, shirts, jeans, bridal wears, boots and some casual wears. Do some window shopping and get ideas for mixing and matching accessories. Try to find trendy dresses on sales or at less expensive stores or outlets. Collect some fashion magazines from famous fashion designers outlets & find the things which cater your style and keep an eye open for shopping deals. Girls Shopping Mall Fun Day - Fashion Adventure is super amazing mobile game to fulfil your shopping desires. If you are willing to open a new business of fashion. Get educate yourself that how new brands attract customers with concessions on new products or new arrivals. Sign up for jobs alert as cashier through supermarket store websites & social media pages.

Try to be flexible on brands and models. Pick up some items from off-season sales. Retailers will put off-season items on sale to clear the inventory. Shop on holidays to get deals as retailers know people will be off on holidays like memorial day, labor day, president's day, Christmas and new year. That means retailers will be running discount sales deals. Look around for holiday bargains on thanksgiving and black Friday. Be the secret shopper at big shopping mall day out. Best shopping days could be thanksgiving after Christmas clearance sales discounts.

Girls Shopping Mall Fun Day - Fashion Adventure Features:

* New fashion designers clothes/dresses sales on new arrivals
* Enjoy the big discounts on promo codes and voucher coupons on sales days
* Design and decorate your personal dress in top famous fashion designer boutique
* Try & collects many dresses on big clearance sales deals
* Design & decorate your desired jewellery, necklaces, bracelets, shoes and bags
* Photoshoot for your favourite brands with your beloved fashion models
* Pay the bill after big clearance sales discounts & avail offers
* Girls getting ready for day out shopping mall fun in virtual shopping malls game
* Be the secret shopper and pay with cash or credit cards in hyper market store
* Easy to play & smooth game play with story based shopping mall day out fun

This Girls Shopping Mall Fun Day - Fashion Adventure game represents the supermarket managements rules and regulations with customers, products and brands management as well.If you love to go for shopping with friends and family, this is perfect shopping adventure game for you. Enjoy the shopping mall lifestyle and win style competition and models photoshoot for favourite brands. Your photoshoot can be on cover page of your favourite shopping brand. Enjoy the tax-free weekend shopping malls sales offers. Sign up and be aware with your favourite shopping brands offers. Follow all fashion designers new arrivals through social media and contact designers for some big discounts. Manage your budget and plan for family lifestyle shopping. This app is free to play entertainment game for girls.

title: Big Nose Caveman and the Witchdoctor
description:
A platformer about the caveman with big nose.The player controls a cave man character who has had all his bones stolen from a prehistoric bank by a dinosaur and the his own - witchdoctor. Bignose sets off on an adventure through numerous prehistoric settings. Bignose defeats enemies using a club; however, he also has access to a primitive skate board device (stone-boarding), via his invention - the wheel. The game is essentially a platform game in which the player collects bones and other items, while travelling from left to right until reaching the goal. 
Help big nose caveman against dinosaur and witchdoctor and get their bone again.

Big Nose Caveman and the Witchdoctor features:
 - 2d pixel funny platformer game
 - caveman with stage and level from prehistoric 
 - Easy to play with jump and hit the dinosaur

title: Super Thief - Super Jungle World 2
description:
Super Thief - Super Jungle World 2 fans are complaining that their creations are being removed from the game without a reason or explanation.
This has happened before but fans knew that it was for the stages that had glitches.
The company should explain to the fans that they have changed the process.
If not, they should still tell them about the stages and why they are being removed from the game.
A few months ago, game were told that the stages in Super Thief - Super Jungle World 2 with glitches would be removed.
Super Jungle World Adventure is a super adventure of jungle world, a jungle boy want to become a treasure hunter.

Features
- Moving background music and sound effects
- 9 challenging enemies: red snake, giant snail, yellow hornet, cloud pig and more secret enemies etc
- Pick up items to become bigger, invincible or obtain ability of throwing ball
- Jump on the top of enemy to defeat them
- Break brick to release power-up item

How to play
- Tap Left + Right to move around
- Tap Left + Right to swing vine
- Jump on the top of enemy to defeat them, or throw ball at them.
- Collect millions coins as many as you can to unlock new levels and gather power-up items
- Tap Jump button to break brick
- Hold Jump button for a while to jump higher
- Stand on the top of tunnel for while to enter into it.

Now, it's time to install the game and enjoy Fun Run and Jump, Crouch, Power-Up., You are a real hero...

title: Survival Island 2018
description:
The wet and wild escape epic adventure of survival island escape begins, wrecked in the middle of the frenzy freezing deep ocean you are one of the army commando and raft survival simulator hero who escaped the brutal waves and pushed towards to the lonely and deserted wild island, you are a lone survivor hunter and killer shooter to deal with the environment until any 911 rescue teams search for you. Survival island escape is the only option, unveil the survivor escape mysteries of this thrive Jungle island, as a trained professional solider of US armed forces and raft survival hero army commando, you have been trained to survive in hard time intense situations by the expert US marshals war school and academy, show extreme skills in fighting off dangerous predators and woolly mammoths, craft weapons, build shelter, explore wilderness and survive at all costs with in this man versus wild escape series of bold action-strategy survival island game of lost Jungle island. Engage into multiple tasks, use your gadgets, axe, guns and rifles expertise for Lone survivor escape, combat wild escape adventure animals like lion, tiger, bear kill and hunt like a warrior to save your life, using your hunting and assault skills, emerge as a brave hunting raft survival simulator hero hunting trooper in this thrilling raft survival island escape adventure mission, execute your escape plan and go for the run, clash with the titans of the rogue jungle. It seems like there is no sign of humans or earth nearby, wreckage that made you realize that you are the only lone survivor of ship crash, fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive, the sea creatures like hungry and angry sharks, alligators and crocodiles are waiting to take you as a prey, be careful commando and swim to escape yourself from these sea monsters, craft equipment. 

This thrive raft survival island is an open world surrounded by the deep sea, you have to survive in this hostile environment, hunt, explore, craft and build rafts for survival island game, roam in forest jungle island feels like an apocalypse, salvage anything that may help you to keep you alive, beware of the sea pirates as there are some signs of looted treasure buried around the wild island caves, try to avoid clash against furious wild island predators, wild escape and build shelters to camouflage from raider. You as a SWAT police force commando have to plan all your moves very carefully because there is much danger around. Complete various missions like crossing the deadly sea and reaching the shores by dodging the angry crocs waiting for you to get tired and drown in the sea fighting with waves. Once you reach the shore, cut down the trees and collect rocks to lit the fire, use your top tools and kit like axe and hammer to cut and break stones. Lone Survivor Escape and hunt for food chase rabbits, goat and deer to get the meat for food use bow and arrow or your or assault shooting skills killing gun.

title: 脱出ゲームメーカー
description: 脱出ゲームを作って遊ぼう！脱出ゲームメーカーはプログラミングの知識がなくても自分自身でオリジナルの脱出ゲームを作成・公開し、他のユーザーに遊んでもらうことができます。
descriptionHTML: 脱出ゲームを作って遊ぼう！脱出ゲームメーカーはプログラミングの知識がなくても自分自身でオリジナルの脱出ゲームを作成・公開し、他のユーザーに遊んでもらうことができます。
summary: Make escape games and play
recentChanges:
・シーン部品画像の重ね制限を解除し、自由に移動、拡大縮小、重ねることができるようになりました。
・ゲームのプレイ数、クリア数をサーバ側で集計開始しました。
・自分がプレイ/クリアしたゲームに目印がつくようになりました。
・アイテム長押しで使用→不使用の切り替えができるようになりました。
・アイテム上限数を拡張しました（5個→制限なし）。
・アイテム削除時に使用アイテムがずれる問題を修正しました。

title: ZC: Island Survival
description:
ZC: Island Survival is a top-down survival game with a fast paced day/night cycle. Fight zombies (optional), hunt rabbits, and build your shelter to protect yourself from the dangers that lurk the island. Gather resources to craft weapons, ammo, and the tools needed to survive. Explore your surroundings to find all the secrets that lie within the island.

Building:

Craft foundations, walls and doorways to create creative structures to protect yourself from zombies.

Place campfires to cook harvested meat, furnaces to smelt ore, and workbenches to craft advanced tools and weapons.

Coming Soon

*Hard Mode 
*Rare Weapons
*New Animal
*In-Game Store
*Lantern

Created by Jakewd18 Games
descriptionHTML:
ZC: Island Survival is a top-down survival game with a fast paced day/night cycle. Fight zombies (optional), hunt rabbits, and build your shelter to protect yourself from the dangers that lurk the island. Gather resources to craft weapons, ammo, and the tools needed to survive. Explore your surroundings to find all the secrets that lie within the island.

Building:

Craft foundations, walls and doorways to create creative structures to protect yourself from zombies.

Place campfires to cook harvested meat, furnaces to smelt ore, and workbenches to craft advanced tools and weapons.

title: Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King
description:
Do you like fruit shoot game? Have you played archery fruit shooting games? Here is new fruit shooter game as Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King game. 
You can meet your shooting ambition and improve your focus by shooting watermelons. Watermelon shooter is a gun simulator game for free to improve your focus and shooting skills level. Aim the targeted watermelon; press trigger and shoot the watermelon. Enjoy the real smash and bursting out of it. In this fruit shooting gun simulator game you will crush fruits by focusing on your target and Become shooting King.

This Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King game is new gun simulator where you hit the target with real pistol or gun in your hand. Watermelon shooter is the best shooting practice game where you can shoot freely without any fear of damage. Targets are fruits so there is no risk of getting hurt of damages. Be concentrated and focus on your target. Watermelons are moving around, keep an eye on the movement and hit your shoot accurately and be a shooting king.

Game Play
Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King is designed with an interesting game play so it can help you in a better way to improve your shooting skills. Game contains various levels and missions. Every mission has it’s own difficulty and interest level. Every level provides a number of watermelons to shoot with a number of bullets. The most interesting this is that you will never run out of bullets if you are shooting watermelons but bullets will be wasted if you will shoot somewhere wrong. You are provided with ample time to set your aims so don’t worry about time; just focus your target and shoot accurately. Guns are featured where you can choose and set accuracy level of every gun. Shoot your watermelon perfectly centered and enjoy the real burst.

Hint
Focus your target and hit only watermelon. Hitting around or other than target can fail you to achieve mission.

Get ready to aim and shoot to crush all the watermelons as a fruit smasher while playing the best watermelon shooting game. Are you looking for the best sniper shooting games with realistic shooting arena? Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King game is perfect for you to become an arcade shooter and have a shooting adventure. There are many thrilling challenges and adventures in the watermelon sniper shooting game but only for the pro sniper shooters. Get trained through this arcade shooting game with modern sniper guns like as pro sniper shooter in the modern army-training zone. This juicy arcade game is one of the most addictive and entertaining watermelon shooter games to display you watermelon-splashing skills to become a real army man. Enjoy with this awesome target shoot games to feel the real fun and thrill of fruit smasher experience.

Hold gun in your hand and be a real shooter. Focus and aim at target. Shoot it accurately and try to crush maximum watermelons in single shot. Maybe you have played many fruit shooting games like apple shooting but this Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King can feel you like a real shooting experience. You may have played archery fruit shooting, crushing or smashing games but not by holding a gun or pistol in your hand.

Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King has realistic environment and stunning graphics for you to get real fun and adventure. It’s user friendly interface and sweet sound effects makes an addictive game. Watermelon fruit shooter adventure has real time simulation, based on explosive sniper guns and more than one challenging missions to hit the target. It’s a time to check your sniper shooting skills with unlimited resources through this shooting game.


Features of Watermelon Shooting - Target Shooting King:- Real shooting Training- Realistic crushing and smashing
-Real Sound & Particle Effects- Real Burst & Blast- Aim & Smash Target- Multiple Levels & Missions- Addictive FPS Game- Accuracy Adjustments Of Guns- Easy & Realistic Controls

Play our wooden tiles for fun and get the feeling of playing a real piano. We have all your favourite artist's songs so you won't get bored! All you have to do is click as fast as you can on wooden tiles and try to beat your best score!

Good luck!


FOR OFFICIALS!

OUR MELODIES ARE CREATED AT THE STUDIO WITH PIANO, WE DON'T USE ANY COPYRIGTHED MATERIAL!

title: USA Cities - Travel and Building Craft
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of USA Cities - Travel and Building Craft.

USA Cities - Travel and Building Craft - this is an incredible hit game for the mobile phone among the games of the genre of crafting and big construction! USA is a country of skyscrapers and a great archetypes, which is developing and being built every day more strongly. If you want a personal skyscraper in which there will be absolutely everything, then this building craft will give you adventures. Think of a construction plan, make a foundation, find building blocks. You have 48 hours to build a skyscraper and become the best builder in this block world of America.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- You will visit the Statue of Liberty
- Explore the city
- Familiar block building graphics
- You can build skyscrapers and bridges

Use and improve your creativity in these bloodless battles in the big universe of building blocks with the help of USA Cities - Travel and Building Craft.

title: Mobile Miner
description:
Dig and mine materials, upgrade your gear and get rich!

Mobile Miner is a resource management mining game. You will need to find a balance between depositing materials to increase your daily salary, selling materials for instant cash, and using materials to upgrade your gear.

The ground you will be mining is all randomly generated. You will be given a plot of land to start mining on that is twenty blocks wide. As you dig and start making a profit, you can purchase the neighboring plots of land to mine. You will find higher rarity materials as you dig deeper, and as you mine on more expensive plots of land.
descriptionHTML:

title: Wario Bros 8: Don Doki Don
description: Jump over turtle, smash the brick and come over many world, you will join an exciting arcade adventure.The players are bearded dwarves who must defeat various enemies by using a mallet to stun them. Players can pick stunned enemies up and throw them at other enemies to destroy them. Destroyed enemies leave behind fruit which can be collected for points. Once all enemies are destroyed play proceeds to the next level which is generally more difficult.

In the amusement park cats hooligans have laid traps on the rails! Rather save all the inhabitants from trouble! Jump into the trolley and eliminate all the dangers on your way

title: Super woddi Adventure Run :Woodpecker
description:
Super woddi Adventure Run Woodpecker is cool Jump and Run addictive non-stop old school arcade jungle adventure game!
Super woddi Adventure Run Woodpecker is a super classic adventure and legendary side-scrolling arcade platformer.

How to play Super woddi Adventure Run Woodpecker
• To move the Super woodpecker click on right or left on the control pad!
• Press Jump-button AND right or left for running; press Jump and B together for a higher and wider jump!
• Press B-button to make Super woody funny woodpecker jumping!
• Click down for ducking or on some tree stumps to get to a bonus level!
• Super woddi Adventure Run Woodpecker swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher ... release your finger from button to go down!


Features of Super woddi Adventure Run Woodpecker:
• +50 beautiful, well-designed and challenging levels with increasing difficulty
• 8 awesome boss fights (angry scorpion, dangerous spider, bee golem and crocodile boss) in 8 different castles
• Over 20 different, great animated enemies such as crocs, frogs, spiders, snails and many more
• Addictive, thrilling and challenging jungle adventure hit
• High resolution graphics - great mix between 2D and 3D graphics
• Old school jump and run platform / obstacles runner
• Side-scroller gameplay with easy game console pad controls
• Easy and free to play - hard to master
• Classic jungle retro running and jumping adventure
• Retro arcade music and old school sound effects
• Many power ups, bonus levels, hidden blocks and bonus items
• Simple & Intuitive game control through retro control pad like on console games
• Special woody super woodpecker surprises hidden in destroyable blocks and bricks
• Amazing gameplay reminding to retro classic games

Enjoy this brand new woody Super woodpecker Adventure For FREE, Download Now!

Ninja Kakarot sayan Warrior of Bandicoot Ninja Heroes Ultimate Ultrat Instinct Battle of
Dragon Legends Ball Z Anime Battle Royale Dragon saiyan fighting series plays like 3D fighting game of Narutoo .
Ninja Kakarot sayan Warrior of Bandicoot Ninja Heroes Ultimate Ultrat Instinct Battle
Dragon Legends Ball Z Allows players to play through the original events of Narut0 the Super Saiyan story.
Choose your champion and play with a lot of special attacks, different for each champion. Power Up with kaioken, defeat all enemies with kamehameha, get the energy to get the genkidama.
Great Anime Battle Royal fight (combatants) between Goku and his teammates with Super Saiyan, Super Namek, and evil, devil forces, vs other universe forces. The game is also a fight between superheroes.
In this game, you have chance to become Anime Battle Royal super warrior in saiyan world, use cool skills like Ki Blast, Kamehameha, Bigbang attack, Dragon Recall … to kill enemy and get highest score in the final tournament battle and save the world.
Beautiful transformation effect: you can transform to SSJ, SSJ2, SSJ GOD …
The cool saiyan transform effect and many bosses what you will love the way to fight if you love for dragon shadow battle Fan FC and You like it.

With Anime Battle Royal Super Saiyan Levels from 1 to 20 and SSJG, SSGSS for strongest power with full skills will bring you to an ultimate saiyan battle of dragon shadow battle.

Many skills like Kamehameha, Dragon Recall, Big Bang Attack, Ki Blast and Monkey King Recall ... and many more coming soon.

The game is designed in the form of shadow and flexible movement, shadow fight battle of 2 dragon warriors in the world.

- Kick and Punch Attack.

title: Space Wars  craft. Battle of Universe
description:
This lite, pocket edition game, inspired by the popular cube / voxel based crafting games for boys and girls lets you build, create, craft and explore space worlds!  Game for teenagers and adults! Exploration world craft is here!  Creative revolution game for boys and girls. Explore the space worlds by yourself or with your friends!

Alien zombie shooting games in a sci-fi craft setting. Survival arena mode with leader boards. Crafting & building of space tanks. Action shooter with sniper rifles, pixel guns and exploration of a sandbox world.

This pocket edition (PE) game contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, high FPS, without any compromise.
Build! Rule! Live! Be creative!

Use extreme guns to survive. Alien shooting will be easier with a selection of weapons ranging from bolter rifles to a pixel gun. Become the best shooter with an elite precision sniper rifle. Get to the frontline as a commando (like SAS) and fight for the colony.

Coming soon:
Multiplayer
Crafting items and weapons
Survival mode
Day & night
Cube Craft
Story mode 
Stats and inventory
Different worlds (hell, heaven, lair, dungeon etc.)

title: Kirikou adventure
description:
popular folk tale from West Africa. Kirikou  informs his mother from the womb that it's time for him to be born, but when she's too slow, he simply does the work himself. After learning that his parents' village is being threatened by a sorceress with a taste for human flesh, Kirikou leaps into action to save the day, encountering friends and foes along the way, including a monster who can drain waterfalls and lakes with his enormous thirst and a wise man living on a magic mountain.
An enjoyable and simple animation with an honest moral lesson, though clearly made for very small children. It makes for a good time
join him in his adventure.

The game is really simple and easy but challenging. Tap on blue tiles as quick as you can and go deep into the ocean!

Our artists specifically design this game atmosphere to be relaxing yet fun to play in. to our piano melodies. The game gets faster with time so keep the focus on and enjoy!

We created these melodies on our own with piano, so there is no copyrighted material! Forget your daily problems and just listen to our piano melodies. The game gets faster with time so keep the focus on and enjoy!

description: Very cute dinosaur brothers adventure game has come out. big dinosaurs can step on fire, and small dinosaurs jump higher. They are good friends and often venture out together. This time they came to the forest looking for roast chicken. Come and venture with them .

title: Jurassic Survival Island: Animal Fire Escape
description:
Amazon jungle is on Fire! Animals are in real danger, they don’t know where to go & Fire is turning everything into Ashes. You’re professional firefighter & Army helicopter driver and you know how to fly army jet too. Start your army jet or army helicopter engine and take some water with you. Reach at amazon jungle as fast as you can and rescue wild animals they’re looking for some help.  

Return to the wildness in the most visually stunning Rescue Deer hunting simulator on Android!  Travel from America to the Jungle of Central Africa in an epic journey to Rescue the world’s most exotic Wild animals! We will take you on a trip to the Safari where you can’t hunt deer but to rescue them from fire and prove your worth as a professional saviour. As the Hunting season is on! Rescue as many Animals as you can to become the ultimate deer rescue champion and get rewards.

Your main duty is to transport the animals from Safari Jungle which is on fire to the Zoo hospital in the provided time limit otherwise fire will turn them into ashes. The king lion, beautiful deer and beast tiger are in extreme danger you have to take them to the zoo hospital in this rescue mission with this animal rescue games free and rescue helicopter games. In this helicopter rescue 3d games you have to pick animals and take them into the cages and operate the helicopter by following highlighted arrows and landing the helicopter on the helipad which is glowing to direct you. So get ready to be a helicopter driver in this wild animal games rescue games and helicopter rescue games. This is a wild craft rescue animal simulation game which simulates you’re driving and flying helicopter skills in a quite realistic environment.

Are you a pet person? What about being a pet HERO? Save abandoned animals and bring them to the town. Latest addition of animal rescue games you have to save wild animals lives in amazon jungle. Here, we have merged the fun of wild animal transporter games and animal simulation rescue.  Be part of one of the best wild animal transporter games with a twist of animal rescue games. Play as a 911 helicopter rescue driver and rescue wild animals games since their life depends only on your helicopter drive skills. This helicopter rescue needs some special helicopter driving.


Jurassic Survival Island: Animal Fire Escape Features:

	•	✅ Wild animals including lions, elephants, wolf, deer in the safari jungle.
	•	✅ Animal transporter rescue!
	•	✅ Beautiful and Attractive environment and graphics
	•	✅ Impressive sound effects
	•	✅Great Deer Hunting Experience
	•	✅Real time wild deer rescue animation


Take down predators before you become the prey. In short, this 3D helicopter rescue game will bring multiple challenges for you. Keep in mind that your prey should not escape from you. Rescue animals so real they nearly jump off the screen! Track down and bag the world’s most exotic and elusive rescue game. Fly like a pro helicopter driver.
Share the best Animal Rescue fun with your friends. Become the best helicopter driver that everyone will envy. Enjoy endlessly enjoyable animal rescue game!


We Value your Feedback :)

title: 脱出ゲーム 過去屋台
description:
脱出ゲーム 『過去屋台』


巷で噂の都市伝説 
”過去屋台”


その屋台は、
”後悔している過去に
一度だけ戻ることができる”
と言われている…


戻った過去を
変えるも変えないも本人次第


しかし、謎を解かないと
過去から永遠に出られないとか…



後悔している過去へ戻るお話です。



▼特徴▼
●本作はステージ型で、各ステージに用意された謎を解いていきます。
●ステージごとに分かれたヒントや答えもあるので、
初心者の方も最後までお楽しみいただけます。
●全ステージ無料で遊べます。



▼遊び方▼
●タップで調べます。
●アイテム欄をタップし、アイテムを選択します。
●アイテムは選択中にもう一度タップすると拡大できます。
●画面上にあるメニューボタンを選択してメニューを呼び出します。
●画面上にある？ボタンからヒント、答えをみることができます。



★攻略のポイント★
●画面の至る所をくまなくタップしてみましょう。
●アイテムもくまなく観察しましょう。
●アイテムは組み合わせることもあります。
●タップだけでなくスワイプなどの操作も試してみましょう。
●ゲーム内で得られる全ての情報を逃さないようにしましょう。



★おすすめポイント★
●不思議な雰囲気が好きな方、脱出ゲームが好きな方におすすめ。
●２段階のヒントや答えもあるので、初心者の方にもおすすめです。



★あそびごころ。の特徴★
１ステージのボリュームにこだわり、ちょっと《遊び心》を取り入れました。

That stall,
"In the past I regret
You can only return once "
It is said to ...

title: Vampire Castle: Hero in the Shadows
description:
This is an action-platformer video game. Your mission is defeating the vampire . Vampire Castle uses platform gameplay and is divided into six blocks of three stages each, for a total of 18 stages. Simon can move, jump, crouch, climb stairs, and use a magic whip as his primary combat weapon. When the player presses the button to crack the whip, there is a short delay before Simon actually does so.[8] The player begins the game with three lives, and must complete the current block of stages before a timer runs out. Simon has a health meter, which decreases whenever he is attacked by an enemy or projectile; if the meter is fully depleted, he falls into a pit, or the timer reaches zero, the player loses one life. Hidden food items restore health, and bonus lives are earned at certain score thresholds. A boss character must be defeated at the end of each block in order to advance to the next one; the ultimate goal is to defeat the Count at the end of Stage 18, triggering the collapse of his castle.

Throughout the game, the player can find and use various backup weapons. However, only one such weapon can be carried at a time, and it is lost if the player loses a life. Backup weapons require hearts for their use, which can be found or taken from defeated enemies. Other hidden items include point bonuses, temporary invincibility, whip upgrades (3 levels total), instant destruction of all on-screen enemies, and double/triple use of the backup weapon.

When all lives are lost, the player may continue from the start of the block in which the game ended. 

Destroy the Vampire Castle and bring the light back !

title: Blast Sasuke Ninja games
description:
Unduh dan mainkan Blast Sasuke Ninja games, game Blast Sasuke Ninja games baru untuk anak laki-laki dan perempuan. Jelajahi gua keajaiban dengan platform mengagumkan saat Anda mengendalikan pangeran untuk mengumpulkan koin , dan barang-barang khusus dan menjelajahi lingkungan piramida kuil misterius dalam permainan fantasi ini.

Berlari, melompat, meluncur, dan menyelam melalui perangkap yang rumit, menimbun musuh, dan labirin gua, semuanya dengan kontrol sentuh yang sederhana dan responsif!

- 50 level sulit untuk dijelajahi, masing-masing dengan kejutannya sendiri!
- 16 Tingkat Tantangan yang brutal
- 150 misi sisi pikiran-lentur!
- 198 item pakaian gila untuk mendandani Blast Sasuke Ninja games Anda!

selamat bermain dan berbagialah.

*******************************************************

Faça o download e jogar Blast Sasuke Ninja, o novo jogo Blast Sasuke Ninja para meninos e meninas. Explore cavernas milagrosas com uma incrível plataforma enquanto você controla o príncipe para coletar moedas e itens especiais e explorar o misterioso ambiente pirâmide do templo neste jogo de fantasia.

Corra, pule, deslize e mergulhe em armadilhas intrincadas, acumule inimigos e crie labirintos em cavernas, todos com controles de toque simples e responsivos!

- 50 níveis são difíceis de explorar, cada um com sua própria surpresa!
- 16 níveis de desafios brutais
- 150 missões secundárias alucinantes!
- 198 itens de roupas malucas para vestir seus jogos Blast Sasuke Ninja!

feliz jogar e compartilhá-lo.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Download and play Blast Sasuke Ninja games, the new Blast Sasuke Ninja game for boys and girls. Explore miracle caves with an awesome platform as you control the prince to collect coins, and special items and explore the mysterious temple pyramid environment in this fantasy game.

Run, jump, glide and dive through intricate traps, hoard enemies, and cave mazes, all with simple and responsive touch controls!

- 50 levels are difficult to explore, each with its own surprise!
- 16 levels of brutal challenges
- 150 mind-bending side missions!
- 198 crazy clothes items to dress up your Blast Sasuke Ninja games!

happy play and share it.
