title: mysterious shin-chan : heroic adventure game
description:
Do you want to Recover the old good memories and have fun? Do you want to live one of venturing day with your lovely character Shinnosuke Nohara from shin-chan ? if you want to live this adventure you need just to download : Mysterious jungle chin-chan run this game of the old acarde game in which you will recover all your childhood memories When you was sitting in front of TV playing your arcade console .  I have good news for you because this adventure game of running will give you again this opportunity to play it on your phones and tables. If you want it you should just download it, it’s available on the play store and free. 
You will spend all your adventure in a big scary jungle which is full of evil forces : monsters , stars , and butterfly. To help shin-chan you should fighting them or just dodge there hits and you need to collect a magic diamonds to own a magic power in order defeat them easily on our game chin-chan will collect stars which can really help you to hit them and run away . I forget to tell you that mysterious jungle is Full of mazes just use your brain and develop your skills on running and jumping to find the right direction. 
How to play: it’s so simple 
press arrows to move right and left 
shoot objects by touching A button 
B button to jump and run 
You can kill the guards by jump on their top 
Features:

+ Mysterious jungle shin-chan run has a lot of levels
+ Free run and jump adventures games let’s Download it, it’s Free 
+ the running adventures game / High-resolution Graphics with an old school theme
+ on our game you can jump and run with your hero / Jump and run to avoid and kill guards by fighting them 
+ a lot of enemies: (with different difficulties) 
+ So Many items
+ Jump on the top of enemies to defeat them.
+a wonderful  theme songs 
For more information just contact us. hope you enjoy it

title: Emilut in Aventura
description:
-- RO --

Pornește cu Emiluț în aventură și ajută-l să adune cât mai multe lemne! 

Mai mult decat atât! Dupa ce ati adunat impreuna destule lemne vei putea debloca 3 lumi secrete unde va asteapta o rasplata pe masura efortului depus în padure.

Provoaca-ți prietenii la întrecere, urmărește-i în clasamentul live și rămâi mereu deasupra lor, cu mai multe lemne adunate!

Dacă reușești să îl faci fericit pe Emiluț, el promite că va reveni cu mai multe bonusuri și surprize cât mai curand posibil.

  SPECIFICATII:  

- Distractie infinita pentru tine si prietenii tai!
- Pagina cu sunete (soundboard) cu replicile amuzante ale lui Emilut.
- Mod de joc cu o singura apasare. Apasa pentru a sari. E simplu!
- Games Services: Vezi in timp real pe ce loc te situezi.

 CUM TE JOCI:  

Apasa pe ecran odata pentru a sari! Aduna cat mai multe lemne si deblocheaza lumea secreta. Nu uita sa ajungi pe locul 1!

 Facut in Romania cu pasiune de Wyverin Entertainment ♥

-- EN --

Start the Adventure with Emilut and help him collect as many woods!

More than that! Once you have gathered together enough wood, you can unlock 3 secret worlds where you will be rewarded by the effort made in the forest.

Challenge your friends for the race, watch them in the live standings and stay on top of them, with more woods!

If you manage to make Emilut happy, he promises to return with more bonuses and surprises as soon as possible.

SPECIFICATIONS:

- Endless fun for you and your friends!
- The soundboard page with Emilut's funny replicas.
- One-touch mode. Tap to jump. It's simple!
- Games Services: View in real time where you are.

HOW TO GO:

Click on the screen once to jump! Collect as many woods and unlock the secret world. Do not forget to get 1st!

Made in Romania with passion by Wyverin Entertainment ♥

More than that! Once you have gathered together enough wood, you can unlock 3 secret worlds where you will be rewarded by the effort made in the forest.

Challenge your friends for the race, watch them in the live standings and stay on top of them, with more woods!

If you manage to make Emilut happy, he promises to return with more bonuses and surprises as soon as possible.

SPECIFICATIONS:

- Endless fun for you and your friends!
- The soundboard page with Emilut's funny replicas.
- One-touch mode. Tap to jump. It's simple!
- Games Services: View in real time where you are.

HOW TO GO:

Click on the screen once to jump! Collect as many woods and unlock the secret world. Do not forget to get 1st!

Made in Romania with passion by Wyverin Entertainment ♥

title: Escape Legacy VR - FREE Virtual Reality Game
description:
Escape Legacy VR - Free ( Contains Chapter 1 )

Experience Escape Legacy in Virtual Reality! Wear your VR Headset and get into this amazing VR enviroment! Now escape from numerus puzzle rooms and in a new 360 degrees gameplay! Connect you Bluetooth gamepad or use your HeadSet button to explore and interact while trying to beat the clock and escape!

Your Adventure begins now! Take control of Erica and help her find the secrets behind Ancient Scrolls! Explore tons of escape rooms, try to observe for clues and hidden items, solve difficult puzzles, challenging riddles and make your exit plan quit for escaping as fast as possible from this mysterious place! Use your mind skills to find the solution from mysterius puzzles, collect clues and necessary items to use, observe and investigate every corner of the room! Time is ticking, don't waste time, be quick and push your self to the limits! Live a game experience with a new fresh way of gameplay, control your character like in pc and console games!

Interact with objects in an immersive room escape game! Open your eyes, your hearing, use logical thinking to calculate and your judgment to solve perplexing jigsaws never seen before! Witness a new room escape game with escape puzzle systems! Watch the clock, and make it fast to the exit door! Get away from classic puzzle games and experience a new way of room escape gaming. It will blow your mind and captivate you for many hours of gameplay while making your own walkthrough by guiding you to escape door! Every escape needs an escape plan, make your exit plan with no fear! Combine information collected from each room to get to the next one!

One of the best escape room game you ever played! An addictive room escape game, improve your logical thinking and your puzzle solving ability! Find the clues and win the room escape challenge! A modern puzzle escape 3d game! Find hidden objects, look closely, the answer is out there! Analyze every game aspect and use your logical skills to escape the mysterious Room. Every new room contains different riddles to solve! Get awaked by mystery sound effects! It's up to you to help Erica escape from the old house! Amazing console graphics, build with next generation game engine! Live the graphical realism of a new age on mobile gaming! 

FEATURES 

? Fully Animated True First Person Character
? Puzzles and Items Change Every Time you Play
? Amazing Console like Game Graphics
? Play in VR mode with VR HeadSets!
? 10 Levels with 80+ Rooms to explore
? Over 10 Hours of Gameplay
? Challenging Puzzles
? Thrilling Music and Sound Effects
? Player Interactive Gaming Enviroment
? Intelligent Inventory System
? Unique Scoring system with Global Scoreboards
? Compatible will all Bluetooth Gamepads

ADITIONAL INFORMATION 

On some devices Escape Legacy won't start with first run. Please try Re-Starting the game again or even Restart your Device.

Due to game's hardware requirements, for best user experience we recommend using devices equipped with modern CPUs. 

Although Escape Legacy was heavily Optimised to run at acceptable framerate even on Mid-Range Devices, for optimal performance, we also recommend closing other applications when playing Escape Legacy.

Please note that a network connection is required for Submitting Scores.

Game Saved Progress is stored localy on device, please backup before uninstalling.

Game App is compatible with Android 7 (Nougat) and above.

*NOTE : If you experience game crash, please contact us.

SUPPORT

Are you having problems?

or contact us via Facebook Page.

title: Balance Ball Premium
description:
Balance ball in 3D sky world

There is fully Sifi ambient environment to run your ball to the destiny, face the various challenge in path. Don't fall. Scientific robots are set to shoot the laser on player. Concur on your path and get the finish point.
Game has not facilitate intermediate results to saved - if you fall it will bring you to the beginning of the level. If you wants to start from the point you fall. Just purchase insurance before or select the checkpoint option with in game currency.

Keep the balance of ball and simultaneously operate it on curvy and narrow path.

To unlock next level, player have to mind following condition.
-User must get 3 star to unlock next level
-In  each level user get maximum 100 coin
The coin ratio derives in three criteria, Its on Time, Picking the object and player ball stamina/health.


Every next level will bring you new harder challenges: narrow slopes and bends, dangerous spot areas, hurdles, red laser area, machine teaser - We ensure you every challenge you will fill excitement urethane feeling bored.

SPECIAL GAME DESIGN

Game is designed for clever player who really like to face the challenges in game.
From start to reach at finish you have to pass through the various spirals, curvy ways and critical areas.

Critical area is total new ideas in this game. It's area where player have to keep running and pass through that are as fast as you can. There are the robots that will start to attack on you if you stay at the place any more.

Ball Life line :
Ball initiated with life/power with that you have to reach at the finish points. 
Slider on top of ball indicates its life that decrease health of the ball

Bot Laser :
There are various robots on path will become the hurdles for ball. Robots will shoot the laser in its area.
Bot(Laser) that also decrease the ball(It is also remove by the action-key). By peaking key bot laser will deactivated.

Lifts : 
Lift for the speedy reach at destination. To avoid the long and time consuming path. go through the shortcut lift.
While using lift, mind you pickup objects.

Rotor :
Rotor that rotate to reach one place to another to tease the player ball. 
Don't fall and Keep running slow and with caring the control of ball on Rotor path.
Rotor Movement that work to decrease health of the ball.

Obstacle Bug :
Bug is obstacle that moves like bug bee, with its finance player ball will decrease the health.

Checkpoint :
On the way of road Player ball have to have face the many obstacle to reach at destination. 
There is a possibility to fall down from path and lost the game. It may take further time to start new game and reach again at same position on path. 
To do continue from that position use checkpoint option.
By using checkpoint drone will save the life and put the player on checkpoint.

Insurance :
To use checkpoint you have to pay the certain amount of coin.
Insurance is life saving scheme, you can use it while facing more risky way.
Ultimately, Insurance is advance cost of checkpoint, that charges less the the actual value of checkpoint.

Every next level will bring you new harder challenges: narrow slopes and bends, dangerous spot areas, hurdles, red laser area, machine teaser - We ensure you every challenge you will fill excitement urethane feeling bored.

SPECIAL GAME DESIGN

Game is designed for clever player who really like to face the challenges in game.
From start to reach at finish you have to pass through the various spirals, curvy ways and critical areas.

Critical area is total new ideas in this game. It's area where player have to keep running and pass through that are as fast as you can. There are the robots that will start to attack on you if you stay at the place any more.

Ball Life line :
Ball initiated with life/power with that you have to reach at the finish points.
Slider on top of ball indicates its life that decrease health of the ball

Bot Laser :
There are various robots on path will become the hurdles for ball. Robots will shoot the laser in its area.
Bot(Laser) that also decrease the ball(It is also remove by the action-key). By peaking key bot laser will deactivated.

Lifts :
Lift for the speedy reach at destination. To avoid the long and time consuming path. go through the shortcut lift.
While using lift, mind you pickup objects.

Rotor :
Rotor that rotate to reach one place to another to tease the player ball.
Don't fall and Keep running slow and with caring the control of ball on Rotor path.
Rotor Movement that work to decrease health of the ball.

Obstacle Bug :
Bug is obstacle that moves like bug bee, with its finance player ball will decrease the health.

Checkpoint :
On the way of road Player ball have to have face the many obstacle to reach at destination.
There is a possibility to fall down from path and lost the game. It may take further time to start new game and reach again at same position on path.
To do continue from that position use checkpoint option.
By using checkpoint drone will save the life and put the player on checkpoint.

Insurance :
To use checkpoint you have to pay the certain amount of coin.
Insurance is life saving scheme, you can use it while facing more risky way.
Ultimately, Insurance is advance cost of checkpoint, that charges less the the actual value of checkpoint.
summary: 3D Ball Balance, Ball Control, 3D Balance Ball, Best Ball Balance Free 3D Game

title: Water Slide Uphill Rush Adventure
description:
Hey! Surfers get ready for some ultimate water slide action in the world’s craziest endless runner water park game. This summer vacation get ready to have the best water slide experience so get your swim suits & life jackets ready & head towards the amusement park for an amazing water ride. Its high time to become a professional water surfer show your water surfing and flip diving skills to the world and be the ultimate stuntman. This may be a fun game but be ready for surprising twists and turns. Be Careful! The water slides are quite tricky as you are going to experience some real roller coaster type turns so be prepared to perform some serious stunts and reach down the swimming pool without hurting yourself. Water Slide Uphill Rush Adventure gives you combination of multiple waterslide games free like water slide games, water park games, theme park games, aqua park games, water sliding games and amusement park games. So! Get ready to experience uphill rush in this amazing aquapark adventure game.

Water Slide Uphill Rush Adventure game is here to fulfill your water sliding & flip diving dreams in the most fun & realistic way. This amazing amazing aquapark water slide game is designed for families who like to go to amusement parks especially on summer vacations. Before starting your endless runner water surfing adventure be careful not to fall off the edges and tumble all the way down. Complete levels by making it all the way down and jumping in a swimming pool. For best water sliding experience in Virtual 3D mode switch between different camera angles. Unlock various costumes & swimming gear to beat the time and face the challenging hurdles by collecting coins during dangerous water ride.

You might have played many water games but you haven’t experienced water sliding experience in Virtual Reality. This water park game will give you the thrill of water splashing on your face and will throw away your boredom as you jump into the real roller coaster water slide for some amazing uphill rush of adrenaline by the twists and turns of the slide in the most fantastic way like you have never imagined before. It’s your time to be the best water slider of all the amusement parks in the world. So gear up and show the world that you’re the best water surfer & flip diving stuntman when it comes to water sliding adventure.
Download this epic Aqua Park game and be the best water sliding champion by breaking your own best score & as well as your friends. So HIT the download button now and start your water ride in Ultimate Water Slide Adventure.

Water Slide Uphill Rush Adventure Features:

• Experience the best endless runner Water Park fun game.
• Perform mind-blowing Stunts as a pro Water Surfer.
• Choose different Characters and Outfits.
• Collect Coins & Unlock Swimming and Water Surfing Gear.
• Ride the Water Slide in 3rd Person View.
• Exciting & challenging levels in 3D Amusement Park Environment.
• First ever Water Slide Simulator with VR Mode.

title: Tap Heroes! Tap Tap Game!
description:
◆ ◆ ◆ ◆ Features of the game ◆ ◆ ◆
 ◆ You can play with just a tap! ◆ 
Tap to attack monsters!
Strengthen the hero with the gold acquired by defeating the monster.

 ◆ Enthusiastic companions ◆ 
Even while neglecting game, your companions will earn gold for you.
Strengthen your colleagues with the gold you earn.
Friends will have special skills.

 ◆ Strong artifacts ◆ 
You can get artifacts by advancing the game.
Let's get a strong effect by getting it!

 ◆ Join Arena to compete with people all over the world ◆ 
You can compete with other players to get higher rank
You can get items according to the result.

□ Recommended points
1. Easy to play
2. You are addictive
3. Free game


◆ ◆ ◆ ◆ Function explanation ◆◆◆◆
■The protagonist
Tap the screen and Hero attacks enemy.
By raising the level of the hero the attack power will rise when tapping.
By reaching a certain level of hero, you will be able to use unique skills.

■ Skills
You can unlock skills by reaching a certain level for your hero.
Each skill has a powerful effect.
Mana is necessary to use skill.

■ Mana
You consume mana to use skills.
Mana will recover after a certain period of time.

■Companions
Companions attack monsters automatically.
Increasing the level of your compnions will increase the attack power when attacking enemies.
When your companions reach a certain level, you can unlock unique skills for them.

■Hero Equipment
By reaching a certain number of stages you can get the hero's equipment randomly.
Equipment has a special effect.

■Companion Equipment
You can own fellow’s equipment with reward such as arena.
When you acquire the equipments of a companion, the damage of companion will increase.
Just acquiring companion’s equipment has effect.

■Rebirth
You can incarnate by reaching a certain level.
Rebirth can be obtained according to the number of stages when incarnating.
When rebirth, gold and equipment of the hero will lost, but you will return stronger and more powerful.

■ Artifact
You can earn artifacts by consuming relics.
By acquiring artifacts, hero and friends become stronger.

■ Treasures
You can earn treasure by consuming gems.
Treasures have a very powerful effect.
Some treasures have special effects that can not be found in artifacts.

title: Unfolded : Old Wounds
description:
Unfolded : Old Wounds is a prologue chapter of Unfolded series, a Point & Click Adventure Game based on the 40's Jeju island, South Korea.

Open the Grandpa's old journal and step into the darkest era of Korea's history.
Gather and Interact with items to keep yourself and your mom from starving.
Write your journal to keep record of things happening around you.

Not all wounds heal.
Find out the source of herman's old wound in this beautiful but bleak adventure.

---
All incidents, dialogue, and characters are products of the author's imagination and are not to be construed as real. Where real-life historical figures may appear, the situations, incidents, and dialogues concerning those persons are entirely fictional and are not intended to depict actual events or to change the entirely fictional nature of the work. In all other respects, any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, events, or locales is entirely coincidental.

title: Ocean World - Underwater Story
description:
Explore the underwater worlds filled with dangers and treasures.
Collect treasures and pump your skills.
Dive deeper to find more gold.

Crazy Submarine - Pirate Treasure Hunter is regularly updated with new features.

Compatible with Android 5.1 and higher.

title: Family Hidden Secret: Mysterious Adventure
description:
Welcome to Britain in the latter part of XIX century – the days when science walks along with witchcraft. At these times high in the mountains a criminal detective case happened. 

Here you are — a young aristocrat. As a child, you have been forced to leave your native town for a mysterious reason. Born into money, you are charming, smart, brave...Still you can’t solve this puzzle: why did your parents prohibit you from returning? A few days ago you got a strange message: your parents disappeared. During a long period, they have never come back and presumed dead. Deep in your heart, you know — you have to return from exile to reveal shrouded secret... 

A passenger train arrives. Now you come back home to claim the inheritance, find the hidden treasures. The detective adventure starts in your childhood house. This old mansion once filled with love, now is full off hidden artifacts, puzzles and strange clues. 
In Family Hidden Secret: Mysterious Adventure meet amazing characters, search for mysterious shrouded objects. Escape dangerous traps in order to solve this criminal detective story. 

Family Hidden Secret: Mysterious Adventure Features: 

🏡Spectacular 3D visualization of Victorian Britain. The town and suburbs pictured with love and care. 

🃏 Several challenging mini-games to play 

· Match 3 game. Magical Machine working with gems and crystals. Who knows, maybe it’s a key to an alternative universe? 

· Mini card game. Lift the veil of the dark past of township. See its future! 

· “Hunting” game. Watch out! Spy on monsters and defend citizens from the dark essences appearing from nowhere! 

🕴 Unique characters to interact with. Each has his own story, temper, specific features. You know they can help get masked clues and find the family treasure 

🔍Different locations to search for hidden objects and artifacts 

🎮 A world of quest games to play and uncover the dark mystery of people in this town. 

Enjoy playing search and find games and solving mysteries? Searching for something new in detective games? Discover Family Hidden Secret – Mysterious Adventure and investigate this puzzling case!

title: Swords and Souls: A Soul Y8 Adventure
description:
Swords and Souls: A Soul Y8 Adventure is the perfect game for soul game lovers! In this swords and sandals y8game, you will create a hero, buy him a nice weapon like sword or shield and of course, a protective armor. Your mission is to follow the scarecrow guide to train your skills, strength, agility and accuracy. To complete each type of training, you must win different mini games. Your moves and skills will be leveled up with your stats.

What makes the y8 game more interesting is that you can upgrade your skills and weapons, until you become the biggest hero of all time! What's more, you can customize your knights - you can give them a name, choose the color of their hair and armors, and also change the style of their faces and eyesOnce you are ready, you should take your place in the arena to struggle against evil monsters or tough warriors. 

.Will you become a legendary knight who defeated all the monsters and warriors?

How to play Swords and Souls: A Soul Y8 Adventure:
- Tap on the screen to choose target and practice.
- Use the arrow keys to train your moves
- Use the button to fight

Features of Swords and Souls: A Soul Y8 Adventure:
- 30 levels and survival mode to explore
- 5 minigames to complete your training and improve your stats
- 44 enemies and monsters to fight against
- Many equipment, upgrades, skills, items and abilities
- Medieval-styled design

Play Swords and Souls: A Soul Y8 Adventure now to be one part of the best swords and sandals y8 adventure ever!

title: CONCLUSE Full (Now Free)
description:
You won't find your now typical jump scares here; there is something deeper at work, something which begins to bridge the gap of what is real and what isn't. Experience PS1 era horror on your mobile device.

STORY
After three long years of searching for his missing wife, Carolyn, Michael Benson is at his wit's end. Just as he is about to throw in the towel and end his search, he receives an anonymous tip on his answering machine. The caller claims to have seen Carolyn in 'Hell', a strangely named town in the boondocks of New England. With little else to go on, Michael sets out for 'Hell', could his wife really be there?

FEATURES
*Low resolution graphics keep the game true to its lost ps1 origins.
*Mostly monochromatic color scheme. 
*60+ keys and items to aid in your search.
*Unique puzzles to uncover hidden items and gain access to new areas.
*High quality cutscenes, which are also brief to keep emphasis on gameplay.
*Excellent voice acting pulls players into the shoes of the protagonist.

NOTICE: The game requires access to your device storage so that it can read and write to save files. It will never access your media or any other files besides the game's save files.

title: The Tumble-poup Ghost buster .
description:
Tumble-poup is a system prepared a variety of gamers where the goal is to obtain eliminate each degree of foes by attracting them right into - after that expeling them from - a mobile vacuum-cleaner.

TUMBLE-POUP was and still the best arcade games you can feel the simplicity of playing it, it's so simple and addictive game and it's also a game that can remind you of your best childhood memories. Some players said this is the best fighting game

Preserving back the fire button brings in the opponents right into the cleaner, launching the button creates them to be removed back out. Gotten rid of resistances function as projectiles that may injure in addition to remove various other on-screen opponents that they hit. All challengers need to be eliminated prior to gamers can continue to the following stage.

Throughout the game, letters of the alphabet arbitrarily turn up in bubbles. These can be accumulated to eventually create words "TUMBLE-POP". As without delay as this has actually been acquired gamers are transferred to a time-limited inspiration level, supplying the opportunity making benefit elements and also included lives.



Please note that this game is just a remade from the classic one is just forb fans to play Tumble-poup which is also known by ( タンブル・ポップ ) so its just a clone game

title: 怪異掲示板と7つのウワサ 【ノベルゲーム】
description:
☆GoogleインディーゲームフェスティバルTop10入賞作品☆

ホラー × 青春 × 学園 × チャット小説 のライトノベルゲーム
本編はすべて無料のノベルゲームです。(クリア所要時間： 約2時間）

今までに無かった、新感覚のスマホのためのノベルゲームです！

★大人気シリーズ第3弾！長編チャット小説のライトノベルゲーム★

★こんな人にオススメ★
・ノベルゲームが好きだけど、普通のは飽きた
・ホラーが得意
・感動したい
・ライトノベルが好き
・チャットノベル、チャットフィクションが好き
・ひまつぶししたい
・無料で遊びたい

●あなたの選択がそのまま結末に繋がる「選択式ホラーチャット小説」登場！
●2時間を超えるシナリオボリュームが、無料で遊べる！
●広告少なめでサクサク読める
●全エンディングリスト掲載 & 各章セクションへのスキップが可能！

現在流行している「チャット小説」形式でお届けする、学園ホラーミステリー！
「チャットノベル」ならではのスマホでしかできない様々な仕掛けで、あなたの五感に「リアル」な物語をお届けします。
3人の登場人物がたどり着く、「怪異」の真相とは…？

★ストーリー★

とある高校の新聞部が管理する掲示板には、秘密があった。
その掲示板に書き込まれた「ウワサ」は「現実」となり「怪異」となる…。
果たしてその掲示板に書き込まれる、「7つの怖い話」とは…？

※結末によってはグロテスクな表現・流血描写・残酷な描写があります。

★登場人物★

■あかね　「ぎゃあああああああ！！絶対やだああああああ！！」
　高校2年生。新聞部所属。明るく元気で、ちょっと残念。

■悠樹　「複素数の四則演算ならなんとか……」
　高校1年生。新聞部所属。ちょっぴり弱気。

■紫乃　「……心配していないわけ、ないじゃない」
　高校3年生。新聞部部長。冷静沈着、頼れるお姉さん。

description:

title: Amazing Evolution Of Ninja Go
description:
Fantastic ...
This game about favourite le go assasin ninja in the world, hero against galaxy star enemies , steal your powers to be able to transform into aliens.
Your job is to break this curse and bring back good to the le ninja go world. 
Stop an evil curse from overtaking the world. Charge your omni to be able to become a powerful alien!
Blast all enemies during a holiday journey on a distant planet! 
With Hero, you will play as real toy characters. Toss grenades to blow up brick bridges, and shoot lasers through snowy obstacles!
Use the Ninja's techno blades to fight into enemy vehicles and use them as your own. 
Select between Kai , zane , cole and Jay to battle the Overlord zombie. 
Jump, Run and Gun enemies to dodge attacks, and move back and forth to escape from falling objects. 
Forward running is the only way to keep your life.
It is an application created for this purpose. 
The spirit that embedded inside the ninja could not stop him running over and over again.
Play this amazing game with your super Ninjago and kill enemies at the traps , Destroy enemies and earn weapons , items ,gems.
in this legendary adventure game you will play his name is little jay and kai you have to fight and jump and collect the balls to protect the planet from monsters .

But be careful! Lots of dangers, enemies, troubles, obstacles, difficult traps and bosses are defending your way through the jungle, castles and wonder worlds games. To finish the platformer game Ninja Adventures Jungle Run will have to jump and run over many obstacles, fight and shoot against chibi ninjas, cruel crocs, hedgehogs, skeletons, leps, cats and many other monsters and dragons nin ninjago masters of spinjitzu.
Climb up huge bridges, mountains and stairs, fight against prehistoric enemies, avoid falling bricks, find hidden noir blocks and levels, collect coins, swim through dangerous seas, explore lot of challenging and addictive jungle worlds and lands and defeat all cruel bosses and enemies nin.
the ninja endless mixels games running game can be played with three shinzo hero "blue,red and yellow"in jungle running island and running city dash cruise ninjago games.

Let's pop! Let's have fun.!!!


Features :
• Eliminate as much Ninjago as possible.!
• To get extra score.!
• A high power booster to clear away obstacles.!
• Collect to earn more coins of ninja toy !
• Get high scores with different triggers.!
• Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
• Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface.

title: The Cellar - A Challenging Retro Platformer
description:
The Cellar features 34 rooms, each that need a key or combination of keys to progress. Some chests and keys require backtracking to reach the next room, but beware that dying will cause you to lose your key. You may only carry one key at a time. Unlocking the final red door will require determination, creativity, and perhaps a little luck.

NOTE: Requires OpenGL ES 3.0 Device

Special Thanks:
- Maxine Azzara (title screen)
- Pizzamakesgames (music)
- ARKS Designs @ScissorMarks (tileset)
- ansimuz (monsters)

title: Guardian Episode One
description:
You are about to guide Maia on a treacherous journey where decisions aren't simply about life and death. The gods are watching Maia very closely, judging her behaviours, weighing her choices. Maia's mana is at stake in many of the moves she will make.
In the context of Guardian, 'Mana' represents Maia's personal and spiritual power, her will, her integrity, her inner strength.  Episode One has three different endings depending on what Maia's Mana Score is at the end of the game.

Episode One begins outside a traditional Maori settlement in Fiordland, New Zealand. The people are protected by Guardians, and one guardian, Maia, is censured for her strange nature.  While Maia lives outside the settlement, in the forest, her loyalty remains strong to her people as she protects them from hostile outside forces.

Find out what happens next by playing through our interactive fiction novel.  Make your choices wisely your health and your mana depends upon it.

Episode One is part one of a trilogy.  This is a hybrid historical/science-fiction story that draws on the mythology of the Maori culture in New Zealand.  Guardian is also a global story and taps into the universal human need to belong and understand the mysteries of the world.

FEATURES
+ Guardian Episode One is free to play. 
+ Interactive fiction with choice and consequence.
+ Unique combat system, choose wisely to conquer your enemies.
+ Based on the mythology of the Maori culture with a modern spin
+ Atmospheric soundtracks that incorporate Maori sounds and birdsong.
+ Stylised chapter illustrations featuring characters from the story.

SOCIAL MEDIA
+ www.theguardiangame.com
+ www.facebook.com/guardian.maia
+ www.instagram.com/guardian.maia

title: Pups: the paw adventures
description:
What is Patrol pups: the paw adventures?

First of all, this is an adventure game that shows kids the importance of being involved in the city you reside in.

In the first place, paw heroes are brave rescue pups that work together to protect the community. With this intention, they patrol the streets to help people who are in trouble.

Moreover, the game focuses on a group of three paws. Hence, each of the pups has a specific set of skills based on a real-life profession.

Each world follows different pattern and features recurring themes. In order to unlock a paw, you need to engage in battles and gain coins.

Could you be part of the patrol team?

Disclaimer:
I made this game with only the purpose to have fun and share with other fans.

title: Spottie
description:
Spottie is a free-to-play social application that allows players to connect in real life. While playing Spottie, the players are able to make new friends and win rewards!  Getting started is easy! All you need to do is download our free application, complete a few simple registration questions, and then personalize your profile. Once completed, you are then ready to embark on your new socialization journey!

Spotting and being Spotted is fun, easy, and rewarding! You will begin by answering a set of questions that describe your physical attributes and apparel. These descriptions will be provided as hints to other users in their quest to Spot you! Alternatively, you can Spot other users by simply initiating a game of your own.

Upon finding or being found, you then scan the QR code to earn points for each player, and if you wish, you can become friends! After becoming friends, you can learn more about them by purchasing their personal profile. You can enhance your new friendships by sending them in-app gifts, private messaging, and even in-app phone calls without sharing your phone number! Your privacy is our number one priority!

Get Spottie! Get Discovered! Get Connected!

title: Fantasy Zone: Rainbow World
description:
It's an exciting adventure combine galaxy shooting game - but you are not in the universe, you are in
a fantasy zone - rainbow world. Your mission is control the ship come over each stage, fights an enemy invasion in the titular group of planets. The game contains a number of features atypical of the traditional scrolling shooter.

In the game, the player's ship is placed in a level with a number of bases to destroy. When all the bases are gone, the stage boss appears, who must be defeated in order to move on to the next stage. There are eight stages, and in all of them, except the final one, the scroll is not fixed; the player can move either left or right, although the stage loops. The final level consists of a rematch against all of the previous bosses in succession before facing the final boss.

you can use two different attacks: the standard weapon (initially bullets) and bombs. He can also move down to land on the ground by sprouting feet and walking around until he flies again.

It is possible to upgrade Opa-Opa's weapons, bombs and flying engine to increase speed, as well as get extra lives. Before that, the player must get money by defeating enemies, bases or bosses, and access a shop by touching a marked balloon. Each time a new item is bought, they become more expensive. When the player chooses to exit or the time runs up, another screen appears, in which he or she can select what upgrades Opa-Opa can use; only one engine, weapon and bomb can be equipped at a time.

Some of the new weapons have a time limit that starts as soon as the shop is left. Some of the bombs can be used at any moment, are limited in quantity. Engine upgrades are permanent The powerups can also be reassigned by reentering the shop or touch a balloon with the word "Select" written on it. If the player loses a life, all of the upgrades are lost. 

Fantasy Zone: Rainbow World Features:
 - colorful fantasy world with many cute enemy
 - retro 8bit pixel shooting game
 - 8bit mid classic funny sound
 - Easy game play, just destroy enemy to next over 8 stage and world

 Come to colorful fantasy world now !

title: Slender Man: The Forest
description:
"The mission is to find out the dark secret that hides in the dark forest. But slender man won't let you do it. Whatever you do! don't look back!

Slender Man: The Forest is a horror adventure game. Don’t be fright in the haunted forest as supernatural forces try to harm you on every step. The Slenderman is after you.
You need to escape the forest but first you must find 8 missing old book pages in the dark forest and then run to the exit. Also be careful so you do not face zombie grandma.Look everywhere,
for they could be anywhere. Always remember that every step you take may will be your last - as the slender man watches you.

• Creepy and frighting horror experience
• Frightful horror jumpscare effects

• Real horror and scary sound effects
• Feel the terror in your bones while playing
• Survive the nightmare and escape
• High-quality 3D animation of evil spirits

In Merge Cars - Circle Crash, the player touches right or left to rev up or slow down their car in order to avoid other hastily-moving vehicles, and collect coins to unlock new cool cars. This is a fun, easy-to-play-hard-to-master game that will keep the player entertained for hours.

description:
Develop your fleet, recruit captain, hunt treasure and fight with mighty pirate armies

16 CAMPAIGNS BY THE STORY

Each campaign is extremely challenging for the player, including a variety of tricky locations, major and minor missions, special occurrences, and accompanying sea voyages difficult to survive

MORE THAN 200 PEOPLE AND SUPPORTERS

As captain with special skills, sailors are indispensable in each battle, and a large number of monsters are the opponents that will hinder your journey.

Brings to the player exciting battles with eye-catching effects and unexpected elements. Strong characters will be accompanied by the ultimate skill, which can wipe out enemies in the blink of an eye

title: Island Survival – 30 Days Escape Challenge
description:
Have you ever had a thought what would happen if you ever got stranded on a lonely island? How would you survive with all the limited resources? Well this game lets you be the one who has to survive for 30 days on an island.

What is your Goal?
You have to survive on this island and manage resources to live. Plan an escape before the tsunami hits on 30th day.

Survival strategy
- You have to survive with limited food, water and other resources.
- Manage them very wisely
- If any of the resources get out of stock, you will die.
- Sleep on time to restore your health
- Plan a survival strategy by building a raft and escape the island
- Send message in a bottle for rescue
- You’ll meet your lucky buddy on island. You can take his help with your daily activities.

Game Features
- Resource Management
- Time Management
- Survival planning & strategy
- Escape planning
- Experience island storm and sunny day
- Mini games to play while you sleep and take rest
- Shop to buy tools to improve your fishing skills

So will you escape the island or die trying?
descriptionHTML:
Have you ever had a thought what would happen if you ever got stranded on a lonely island? How would you survive with all the limited resources? Well this game lets you be the one who has to survive for 30 days on an island.

What is your Goal?
You have to survive on this island and manage resources to live. Plan an escape before the tsunami hits on 30th day.

Survival strategy
- You have to survive with limited food, water and other resources.
- Manage them very wisely
- If any of the resources get out of stock, you will die.
- Sleep on time to restore your health
- Plan a survival strategy by building a raft and escape the island
- Send message in a bottle for rescue
- You’ll meet your lucky buddy on island. You can take his help with your daily activities.

Game Features
- Resource Management
- Time Management
- Survival planning & strategy
- Escape planning
- Experience island storm and sunny day
- Mini games to play while you sleep and take rest
- Shop to buy tools to improve your fishing skills

So will you escape the island or die trying?
summary: Can you survive the lonely island for 30 days? Plan your survival strategy.

title: Ultimate Saga Alpha Survival Craft Hopeless Island
description:
Game’s Hut always come up with a unique idea, here we are proud to represent our new concept of the survival of Man named James, he was going to his home from Miami to Columbia, and his plane has to pass through the amazon forest the largest forest in the world. Somehow the Plane crashed and after FOUR days he found himself in a hopeless Island which is full of danger. He left with no food and no shelter to live in the hopeless island. There is heavy storm, Snowfall and extreme weather conditions are in this hopeless island, as you are going to survive here for long time so build new houses, build a shelter and fence to live in, after building a house go inside it and build doors with looks to stay safe in night and in the day, you need to find out food.
You have to use all your sneaking & hunting skills to survive in island! Use hard axe to cut trees, collect wood for fire and search some hunting meet from animals. You will have to eat apples, drink water and cut trees for fire and weapons to get food from animal’s meat. Defend yourself from wild animals and zombies of the island. Survival Island wild escape is new adventure simulator of jungle world survival with adventure missions. Let’s start Hunting & Survival voyage. Plan the Mission to escape from the dangerous Island to survive and return back home.
Try survive and travel to safety. Wilderness survival themed simulation where you need to decide how you spend your time and what action is most crucial for you now in order to survive: building a shelter, finding food, water and traveling, collecting firewood.
This is an uninhabited wilderness. You lack of food and water, have to try your best to survive. Finally escape from the wild island and return to the civilized world. While you stay, you must learn the rules of survival, use your courage and wisdom to conquer the nature.
To survive and escape, you have to craft camp, explore jungle, mountain, ruins, and so on territories, trade with natives, fight against beasts and cannibals, go deep into mystical relics, solve puzzles...
Successful survival depends how passionate you are to escape the island via raft. Survival on this wilderness is a tough challenge where you need to gather different resources likes woods, stones, axe and ropes to build a strong raft and make your stay on the island safe and sound. Be the survival fighter hero and get ready to find tools and resources that would help you in crafting big raft to escape the sea. Wild animals are roaming freely on the island and are in hunt of prey, be cautious and defend yourself from island wilderness and other dangers. An extreme island adventure is waiting for you where you need to implement all possible escape and survival skills to successfully escape the island through sea after crafting a strong big raft for yourself. Make a super hit survival sea escape story with your crafting & fighter skills to explore the island wilderness carefully. Island survival hero find cave for your stay, Swim through the streams, find ropes, build fences, hunt down animals for food, build shelter, make fire, fight the animals that may attack you, build raft out of woods and ropes and escape the island by making a super hit sea escape story.
Ultimate Saga Alpha Survival Craft Hopeless Island Game Features: 
	Explore Island and get amazing hunting experiences
	If you get hungry you become rust
	Eat apples, meet & collect water bottles to uphold energy
	Full freedom, explore the huge island
	Build your own house;
	Advanced system of player skills
	Different kinds of transport.
	Building system (new!)
	 Extraction of resources (firewood, stone, ore)
	 Interaction with objects (fire, oven, anvil, box, sleeping bag)
	Variety of tools and weapons
	Real island adventure
	Superb 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
	Engaging Gameplay where you learn to Survive
